Name: Marlow
Message:
How arrogant!
I’ll make sure that’s
the last breath you take!

Name: Valdir
Message:
Lucien!
Prepare your magic
while I hold them off!

Name: Lucien
Message:
Okay!
I’ll tell you when!
Hang in there!

Help isn’t here yet?
Everyone, fight like
your lives depend on it!

Ready!
Everyone, move!

There are two who
rose to legendary status.
Now,
your legend begins.

Defense Captain
Marlow has fallen!
Onwards to the castle gate!

Enemy reinforcements!
Stand your ground!
Attack!!!
Kill them all!
This port is ours!
I won’t tell you!!!

Hahaha!
Your silence is futile.
As expected...

It is within
the Elven Ruins...

The fragment seems to be
reacting to this place...
Is it ready?

Chief! This is the
object you spoke of.
Great!

We no longer need
this Human monument!
Kill the Humans!

Huh? It should be
here somewhere...
It's a trap...
Everyone, charge!!!
For Talking Island!!!

Did you really think
you could catch me?

In the name
of Gran Kain...
Heed my call!
Carpheous!!!
Do as you will.
Light of Einhasad!
Show us the way!

Ugh...
That evil monster...

It’s true!
It was so funny!

So he would say...
“Hey, Orc. You, Orc.”
W-what is this!
Enemy ambush!
Prepare for combat!

We cannot lose
this place to them!!!

As expected...
Human intervention...
I’ve got to notify - ugh!

They say curiosity
killed the cat.

Some secrets are
better left... secret.

Have fun
with this, boys.

Be sure to bring
back the blueprint!

You’re sure this
is the place?
Who?! Who are you?

Entry is prohibited.
Please turn back.
Wait!

It’s cute that you think
you can stop us.

Didn’t you ever learn
when to back down from a fight?

Damn brat,
wasting our time.

None of you will leave
here alive.
Hahaha! Burn!

By goddess Eva,
I command you.
Power of purification!

Cleanse the evil within
Talking Island!

Ahh, intriguing.
The object is here?

Hey, you. It’d be in
your best interest to scram.
E-enemy ambush!!!
Stop their attack!!!

We’ve defeated the Wyvern!
Everyone, onto the castle!
Stand clear!

Kengpyn!
The age of oppression is at its end!
Along with your vile clan!
How amusing.
Do you know?

Many fools have stood where
you stand now and spoken
those same words!

They all ended up
on their knees
begging for their lives!
You’ll do the same!

Wrong!
It’s your turn to kneel!
Everyone!
Attack!!!

Valdir seized Aden Castle, 
and that tumultuous age
came to a close.
Ah! We’ve reached Talking Island.

They say the key members
of the Silverlight Mercenaries
are all from Talking Island!

Well, let’s get going!
Let’s set off to find our own clan -
one that will become legendary across Aden!

Come on!
This way!

Now!
We’ve got to break
down the castle gates!

Soldiers, come in
when I signal!

Name: Guard Captain
Message: We’ve surrounded them. Cut them down to the last man!

Watch out!!! Enemy
reinforcements. We’ve got to
defeat them and move on.

How odd.
There are less
enemy forces than expected!

It’s a trap!
We need support!

Drat!
Onwards, soldiers!

Name: Elpin
Message:
Valdir! The castle’s
control tower has been
activated.

No... NO!
Our comrades are
falling!

We’ve got to destroy
that control tower!

At this rate
we’ll be finished off!!!

Name: Revolutionary Army Soldier
Message:
It’s Marlow!
Marlow, the enemy clan’s
Elder has appeared!

Argh. I can’t believe
I lost to such pests.

Even so, none of you
would be anything to Kengpyn...
Ugh...

Valdir! There isn’t much
time! We’ve got to
destroy the control tower
immediately!

Name: Dark Lord
Message:
Darkness
will prevail.

Name: Gorsaur
Message:
*Sniff*
Human meat?

Name: Niah
Message:
The relic is gone!
What happened?

Is that dad’s cloak?
Oh no...

Name: Feldheim
Message: You think this is odd?

Going into town
is risky.

Why would they
go that way?

Ask the guards
if they saw them.

Name: Eugene
Message:
Orcs! Keep them
off the Wardstone!

That was close.
Let’s move on.

Name: Cave Keeper
Message:
Hisssss! I’ve been
waiting for you!

Name: Russel
Message:
Don't let that Dark
Mystic get away!

Name: Dark Mystic
Message:
Pest! You won’t
get away!

Who dares challenge
the Dark Brotherhood?

Name: Orc Escort
Message:
Over there!
Protect the
Dark Brotherhood!

Name: Purifying Fairy
Message:
My energy is
almost gone...

Dark energy will
consume the island.

I suspect they have
a secret plan.

Wanna bet to see who
has more kills?

What the-!
Watch out!

Oh no! The
Obelisk of Victory!
Damn brutes!

Didn’t you defeat
that Warchief earlier?

Hold your ground!
Stop them!

Name: Ferron
Message:
I saw someone
suspicious on the way!

He was with our
captors, the Orcs.

He was in all black
and was carrying
a strange book.

My guess is...
a devil worshiper!

Name: Werewolf
Message:
Smells good! Hand
it over, Human!

Name: Orc Warchief
Message:
Ha! You, a mere
mercenary wants
to duel me?

He’s mine. Everyone,
stand down!

Name: Orc Butcher
Message:
Trickery! They
must’ve cheated!

Name: Blood Ranger
Message:
Have you no honor?
Accept defeat!

Kill ‘em!
Kill ‘em all!

Don’t let the Orcs
pass!

We’ll handle this.
Go on to Russel!

Hurry up! The Orcs
will be here soon!

Name: Orc Troop Captain
Message:
Kill! Charge on
until the town!

Name: Harold
Message:
These guys are pros!
Can you handle them?

The Troop Captain is
formidable! He’s yours!

No time! Hurry to
the entrance!

Name: Austin
Message:
Take your place
when ready.

Get started!
It won’t be easy!

Fantastic! But can
you handle three?

Name: Albert the Giant
Message:
Not bad. I trained
those men myself.

I’ll face you next.
This will be fun!

Uncle! You win!
You’re really strong.

Name: Arnold
Message:
Uh oh. I see
lots of monsters!

Name: Orc Leader
Message: What’s this ruckus?

Humans? Here?
Guards! Follow me!

Name: Theodore
Message:
Quick! Get out!
The archaeologists
aren’t here!

Name: Orc Trainer
Message:
Over there!
Crush them!

Name: Tamed Bugbear
Message:
Get ready.
I’ll pummel
you to pieces!

We need to cross the
bridge. Get moving!

Damn! The mercenary
has already crossed!

Thank you. I’ll keep
an eye out.

We can avoid
trouble if the
third one moves.

It’s a relief to
have met you.

Name: High Priest Ethan
Message:
You filthy bug!
How dare you!

You think you can
stop his return?

Thank you for
saving my daughter.

Tell me if you ever
need my help.

Damn you! Face the
terror of darkness!

Name: Sailor Thomas
Message:
You’re here!
Give it to me!

Name: Sailor Andrew
Message:
We can defeat them
now! Give it to me!

Name: Pan
Message:
Hey, you.
Were you well known
on Talking Island?

Meow? You’re in
the Silverlight
Mercenaries? Woah!
Let’s be friends!

Even so, nothing is
free! Hmm... I’ll consider
it for 2 favors!

Name: Ol Mahum Scout
Message:
Hehe. There are still
those we can capture!

Name: Augel
Message:
W-who are you and
what is all this!?

Name: Ol Mahum Looter
Message:
Sniff sniff. Our dark
boss will like it
if we bring you all
to him.

We’ll be rewarded
if the boss likes it!

Sniff sniff! Give in and
be captured, you humans.

N-no! Help...
someone help us!

Name: Aymel
Message:
Pardon me. It’s been
so hectic and I
haven’t been able to
introduce myself yet!

I’m Aymel. Like you,
I’m one of the
Silverlight Mercenaries!

But how did you know
that I was here?
Hmm? Russel?

I guess that meathead
did something right
this time. Haha!

I’m chasing after a witch
whose name is
Elizabeth. You probably
know who she is...

Please let me know
if you find her.
I have a debt to repay!

Name: Gludin Soldier
Message:
I-it’s the undead!
The relic! We’ve got
to protect the relic!

Name: Pirate Navigator
Message:
Hand over the relic
if you don’t want
to be harmed!

Name: Jack
Message:
Argh!
I’ll turn you into
fish food!

Name: Helena
Message:
Turn back because
it’s too dangerous?
How could I!

My base has been a
mess ever since that
gloomy person came!

I’ll have to get a
look of that face!

You’ll keep me safe
even if a battle
occurs, right?
Maybe not...?

Seems Eleanor’s
important friend
has disappeared!

We’ll definitely
find her friend!
Let’s spread out
and look around!

Huh?
The smell is drawing
the bats here!
Be careful!

Let’s head to the
main street for now!
I sincerely hope that
she’s alright...!

She said she was looking
for something precious
so she wouldn’t have
left the graveyard!

Let’s head north of the
graveyard!

Name: Guard Byron
Message:
Russel is over
here! Follow the road
and come here!

It’s a huge relief
you two helped us
in this case of a missing person.

To be frank, I’m
scared of
investigating gloomy
places by myself!

A-arghh!
W-what is this!

It’s dangerous!
Unfortunately, we
need to take
care of this all!

Look for a girl
named Aymel
when you arrive!

She’s a Silverlight
Mercenary who was
sent out early on!

Name: Kidnapped Townsperson
Message:
I don’t want to stay
here any longer!
Let’s go already!

Name: Ol Mahum Soldier
Message:
Sniff sniff! Human!
Where do you think
you’re trying to
enter?

Ah! It’s here!
Get me out meow!

Name: Ol Mahum Officer
Message:
The townspeople are
trapped over there!
Don’t kill me!
Sniff sniff...

Name: Turnell
Message:
Sniff sniff...
A little rat
has snuck in!
Kill it!

Name: Billy
Message:
Were you feeble
things hiding
over here? Hehe.

Hiding it will do you
no good. Hand over
the Holy Artifact!
You fools!

Name: Forde
Message:
You’re crazy if you
think I’ll have it
stolen a second
time! Go on, give it a try!

Say goodbye to
your lower half!
You fool!

Defeat the skeleton
soldiers and join
up with the
reinforcements!

Name: Plunder Captain Kanum
Message:
Haha. I see you’ve
come here alone.

You’re dumber than
my men!
Rob him, boys!
Ah! You imbeciles!
I’ll take you on myself!

We’ll rob you of
absolutely everything!
Hehehehe!

Name: Bhan
Message:
Axemen are
blocking the road!

We’ll need to defeat
the axemen first.

Name: Bolt
Message: We... we’re alive!

Name: Ol Mahum Axeman
Message:
The prisoner
is running away!
Catch the prisoner!

Name: Varot
Message: Venga is over there! Go on! Today is the day he dies!
Be careful! Drat! Venga noticed!

It’s Venga’s lackeys!
Be careful! Venga might slip away!

Well done! We caught Venga before he got away!
Now we only need to put him down!
Be careful with the leather!
I... I mean be careful in general!

Name: Nero
Message: We found the location of the bounty! Hurry up!!!
Let’s grab the bounty and get away before more of them crowd us!
Ah!! They noticed us!!! We don’t have a choice! Prepare to fight!
Defeat them quickly and come out!
Ca... Cacha?! Be careful!

Name: Cacha
Message:
You dare to touch MY belongings?!
I’ll skin you all alive!
Die!

Name: Vinath
Message: Uh oh! Our comrades are fighting against a bugbear! Please help us!

Name: Einhasad Priest
Message: Help us!!!
You pigs!!!
Be purified!
It’s b-big boss!
We... we’re done for.

Name: Big Boss
Message: Leave it to me!

It’s been a while since I’ve had some good meat!
Die, weakling!

Name: Laurel
Message: We’ve found it. Seems they are crowding together over there.

There should be a suspicious object over there!
Please bring it here!

Name: Voldiac
Message:
Oh ho. Here’s an object I didn’t even imagine I’d see.
That’s not something you should be touching so rashly.
Pay the price of your curiosity.

Name: Zarin
Message: We’ve received word that Jackal has been sighted at a post to the north!
There’s no time! Defeat him quickly before it runs away!

Name: Jackal
Message:
Hahaha, seems you have a death wish.
Boys! Give them a rough awakening!
Seems you can put up quite a fight! I’ll deal with you myself!!!

Let’s see you die!
Blood! Blood! Let’s see your blood looks like!
Thank you. Thank you so much!
Ve- Venga is getting away!
Don't worry... I'll get him...
Hahaha, seems you have a death wish!
Boys! Give them a rough awakening!
You fight better than expected! Hehehe.
Hehehe. Give it your best!
Jackal is getting away!
Drat... What speed...

Name: Veda
Message: How dare you steal our ledger!
You must be out of your mind!
Here’s my punch of justice!

Name: High Priest Polemus
Message:
How arrogant!
I’ll put an end to you!

Name: Townsperson
Message:
T-thank you!
We thought we
were going to die!

Name: Troop Captain
Message:
How arrogant!
I’ll skewer you with
this spear!

Name: Rescued Elderly Man
Message:
T-thank you!
There are others if
you head to the right!

Name: Rescued Woman
Message:
Thank you!
Did you perhaps
see my daughter?!

Name: Rescued Child
Message: Mom... mom!

T-thank you
so much! Let’s get
out of here quick!

Name: Sharpshooter
Message:
You really want to
die, don’t you!
You inferior race!

Name: Resurrected Troop Captain
Message:
You’ve started the
ritual on your own!
This is digging
your own grave!

Name: Maille Lizardman High Shaman
Message:
Rise once again,
descendants of
the dragon race!

Arrogant humans!
He promised
the land of Gludio
to us! Be gone!

Name: Chancellor Reuenthal
Message:
You’ve come all
the way here?
You damn worthless fools!

It’s over! Prepare
to accompany each
other to the afterlife!

There is no use
struggling! You are
all nothing in the
face of Beleth!

Name: Alban
Message:
Hey you!
Get me out
first! Over here!

Y-you’re?!
We finally meet!!!

Finally found you!!!
Today is the day I
kill you!

Name: Elizabeth
Message:
Oh young miss,
you’re still alive?

You should’ve just died.
Perhaps you should
deal with the Orcs
before you deal with me?

You’ll have to kiss
your life goodbye if
you intrude in our
plan again.

It’s been so long!
You can’t just
leave like that!
Hahahaha!

Name: Karin
Message:
H-help!
They’re coming
to abduct me!

Muhahaha!
Die in despair
within the evil
summoning stone!

Be careful!
Bring back a good
sword as a present
if you find one!

Ugh, that meathead.
I’ll see you later
Theodore!

Huh? You’re wondering
if Theodore is too
curt?

Haha. There’s a
reason for that. He’s
trying to not get close to you.

I’ll tell you an old
story. You’ve heard
of the Legend of
Valdir, right?

The story of Valdir
and the Silverlight
Mercenaries who
defeated Kengpyn
and Marlow.

In fact, Kengpyn and
Marlow were once a
part of the
Silverlight Mercenaries.

They were two of
the best until they
were taken in
by the darkness...

Theodore recommended
those two to
the mercenary troops.

Theodore didn’t
participate in the
siege of the
Aden Castle.

No... he couldn’t.
He couldn’t bring himself
to kill his friends...
Then after that, he...

He stopped investing
in people. But
strangely enough, he
seems to trust you.

If it’s you,
you could
turn Theodore back
into his old self.

I’ve taken care of
everything! I’ll
keep watch,
you open the prison!

Name: West Blood Ranger
Message:
T-thank you!
Please take care of
the other members as well!

Darn it! Am I
late?! Aymel!
Is Aymel alright?

Name: Keshupone
Message:
Let’s head to the
entrance! We need
to make preparations
before they get here!

Name: Monster Exterminator
Message:
The bugbears
are rushing in!!!

Stop them!!!
The town will be
endangered if we
are defeated!!!

Oh my goodness!
W-what’s with him!
Be careful!!!

Arrrrghhh!!!
C-captain! Help!

Name: Bugbear
Message:
Hehe. Kill! Kill!
Kill all
humans!

Bugbears to the
north! They’re
coming towards us!

They’re rushing in
from the west too!
There’s no end
to them!

Name: Platoon Leader Melbourne
Message: Damn it!

We can’t all die
like this!
Live! Live on!

Name: Horen
Message:
Help!
Someone...
Please save me!

Name: Zareeve
Message:
Don’t let the elf
get away!
Elves fetch
a high price!
Here! Over here!

Name: Lizardman Manhunter
Message:
Hiss! Catch him! The
boss said he would
give us something
tasty to eat!
Who is it!

How dare you
interrupt us!
We’ll kill you!!!

I’m worried
lizardmen
will come after us.

Hurry up!
Ugh! They’re here!

Name: Zariv
Message: Finally found you!

This is
to avenge my
younger brother!

I’ll crush you all
to pieces!

Name: Revenant
Message:
Seems that fool
Reuenthal
was caught?

Well, such things
don’t matter. Hehe.

I’ll kill you to end
the guardian contract
and become free!

Here! Over here!
Get us out of here!

Be careful of
Kuaroon! He isn’t
your run-of-the-mill
average joe!

Name: Kuaroon
Message:
Hehehe...
Foolish humans!

Kill them all!
Blood will bless
us all!!

Name: Ranger Hexor
Message:
Drat!
These bugbears!

The bugbears have
caught scent of
the platoon members.

They’re all
crowding in
that direction!

I’m concerned about
the squad members!
Let’s hurry!

It’s the chancellor
himself! We’re saved!

Name: Faute
Message:
Bakum is in the
inner regions of the colony!

You’ll need to defeat
fighters to reach
all the way there!

Name: Bakum
Message:
You dare to challenge
me?

You, an insignificant,
dare to challenge me?
You’ll pay the price for your arrogance!

Name: Tukan
Message:
Which one is causing
this ruckus!

How dare you
interrupt me!
Witness my rage!

Name: Gludio Guard
Message:
Ahhh!!!
Save us.
Please save us!!!

Name: Schringer
Message: Who are you?!

Can you fight evenly against
my dogs?
Sic him, men!

Seems to be
another guy
Faute sent.

Have you lost
your mind? Get him!

The first tree
is southeast
of here.

There’s not
a moment to spare.
Please hurry.

Name: Dungeon Skeleton Soldier
Message:
This tree
gives us strength!

Get the guy who burned
the tree!

The second tree
is westward
of there.
Be cautious of nearby monsters.
Hehehehe!!
Humans!! Kill ‘em!

The last tree
is northward
of there.

It’s finally the last one.
Please hurry!
Over there! There!
The lizardmen seem to have their mind occupied with something else! Hurry hurry!

Name: Maille Lizardman Pillager
Message: Intruder!

You dare to touch our stuff?!
Kill! Kill!

Name: Mato
Message: This is terrific. I was running short on money.
Grab them!!!
We’ve received word that Kaba, the lord of red bears, has been found!
Whoever catches him will be given a huge reward!
Go!
Th-they...!
An even greater reward will be given to whoever defeats them!
It’s coming! Don’t let Kaba get away!

Name: Hamon
Message: Yes! Let’s get out of here! I don’t want to be here even a moment longer!
Be merciless in defeating those who rush in!
Die! Die you all!
H-he’s finally out!
Ah..! He is...!
He’s the one who killed our comrades...
This is all over...

Name: Mitchell
Message: Great! Then let’s defeat the raiders first!
It wouldn’t be wise to simply walk into a place that’s swarming with them, right?
Over there! The weapons are over there! Let’s burn them before they come rushing in!

Name: Maille Lizardman Trooper
Message: Shh! Who is that!
They’re coming! Be careful!
Over here! Catch them!

Captain...!
You must’ve lost!
He’s someone we must defeat!

Name: Sara Ra
Message: Hmm. The shamans don’t seem to have it.
There are suspicious boxes over there! Could you check them out?

Great! This scroll seems to be proper!
Ah, they’re rushing in as expected!

Maybe they have something to hide?
Let’s defeat them quickly and get away!

Name: Kuata
Message: Grab them! Don’t let those thieves get away!

How dare you try to steal the scroll!
We’ll make this place your final resting places!
Come here! To think the sharpshooter Kariana was here...
Our soldiers are dying!!!

Name: Gludio Soldier
Message:
Ahhh...
S-save us!!!
Ah! D-don’t shoot!

Name: Kariana
Message: Wahaha. How fun.

How dare you covet our land!
As long as I’m here, you will die before your comrades arrive!
Uh... Are we... alive?
Please defeat the bugbear first!
We burn with rage when we think of our comrades who were killed by them.
Please defeat Dark Weavers!
Be cautious of the strange magic Dark Weavers use!

Arghh! They’re after me!
Help me!
Leave it to me!
I’ll get rid of you before I die!
Where did Kaba go?!
Wait a minute. I think that’s Tukan over there. Let’s head over there.

Name: Turek Orc Fighter
Message: Hehehe. It’s you? The one who has been lurking around this region?
Don’t think you’ll be getting out of here alive!
Uh oh! It’s a trap!
Let out of there quickly!
W-wait!! Don’t come this way!
Shriek!

Name: Dark Acolyte
Message:
More sacrificial bugs
have appeared!

Wahaha!
Ahahaha!
You’ll make a
great sacrifice!

Name: Skeleton
Message: Hehehehe!!!

Name: Latos
Message: Look! They’re coming!

The skeletons just
keep coming to life!

The skeletons will
collapse if we defeat
the Dark Brotherhood!

Eliminate the
Dark Brotherhood!

Name: Southern Troop Commandant
Message:
Be careful! We’ve
been spotted!

How dare you touch
the cauldron?!
Damn you all!

Soul Slasher!
Consume them -
and their souls!

I’ll show you the
fruit of our labor!
Giant Skeleton!

You all!
No one leaves
here alive!

We’ve almost restored
peace to Windawood!
Destroy the enemies!

Reinforcements are here.
Trust our allies and fight on!

Looks like none of you
have gotten a grip!
Die!

I see the
Giant Skeleton!
Brace yourselves!

Defeat him, and
victory will be ours!!!

We must destroy the
Dark Brotherhood!

Name: The Amnesiac
Message:
I feel like I’ve
forgotten something...

Something about here...
Seems familiar...

I feel like maybe
I’ll remember after
crossing this bridge...

Name: Angie
Message:
Are you alright?
This is definitely where Elves and Demons
fought in the past...

Hmm... What was it...?
Vapar? Oh, yeah!

An ancient Demon
was sealed here.

I have a bad feeling
about this...

Huff. Huff.
My head feels like
it’s gonna explode...

Spiders?! Augh!
Stop them!

Why are these
guys attacking
me...

Name: Turek Orc
Message: Humans! Catch them!

We must teach
them a lesson!
Destroy them!

I’ll show you
my Orcish strength!
Feeble Human!

Name: Kail
Message:
We’re helpless
against this swarm of Orcs.
Defeat them quickly.

There are too many
war machines.

That’s impossible
without the
help of humans.

Someone is trying
to start a war.

You must uncover
the troublemaker’s
identity!
Prepare yourself!

I smell
filthy Humans!
Kill all Humans!

Name: Duvalte
Message:
If we die,
this whole operation
is ruined!
Don’t die!

Name: Aurora
Message:
The reinforcements
aren’t here yet?

Name: Blood Ranger Soldier
Message:
Not yet, sir!
The soldier that
went to deliver the
message- Argh!

Kill them all!
Tonight,
we feast!

Argh!
I see... the light...

This is where Orcs
and Elves fought
long ago.

Hmm... why is there
large-scale mind
control activity here?

Everything about this
is suspicious...
And this energy-

Why is there dark
energy concentrated
over there?

Hurry - let’s go!
I feel like
something bad is
about to happen!

Name: Blood Ranger Captain
Message:
There are more
coming than we
expected! Everyone,
prepare for battle!

I hope
they’re alive...

Just thinking back
to when we were
attacked still gives
me goosebumps.

There!
We’re almost there!

All the missing
people are gone
because of the
Dark Brotherhood.

They’re collecting
Human bones
to summon
Skeleton Soldiers.

This is where they
do their research.
Production happens
by the ruins.

Name: Carlze
Message:
To think such a
thing was happening
here...

They’ve been using
the cauldron to make
Skeleton Soldiers!

It was a
truly horrific
sight to behold.

Let’s hurry! We
must put an end
to this wrongdoing!

It’s such a relief
having a famous
mercenary here!

I just happened
to be worrying
about how to get there.

The battle against
the Ol Mahum is
raging in front of here.

They are so
incredibly greedy...

They’ve been coming
from all over since
word got out about
the rare crystals.

Well, I’m going
because of my
interest in
Mana Crystals.

If it wasn’t for
the Crystals,
I really wouldn’t want to go.

But having something
to research is
truly a blessing!

The Silverlight
Mercenaries?
What a relief!

The operation
must succeed.

The Orc invasion
will be upon us soon.

We must stop Valter!
Drat! I can’t believe
I didn’t notice!

It’s all over if the
Demon wakes up!
We must stop him.

Name: Valter
Message: Wahahaha... Finally!!!

Argh! Please stop me...
I can’t control my body!

Name: Possessed Valter
Message:
Over he-! Shut up, you!
Revive me already!
Over there! Hurry!

Do not disturb the
ritual!
Demons, attack him!

Argh!!! Please!
Stop them!
He’s incomplete!

Name: Vapar
Message:
Valter... You...!
No matter! I’ll kill
you all!

Name: Soldier
Message:
The Warchief!!!
The Orc Warchief
is here!!!

Let’s go!
We must defeat
the Warchief!

Name: Miles
Message:
Hang in there!
The fate of
Windawood is in
our hands!

The Orc Warchief
was resurrected!
But- how?!

Name: Hardin
Message:
That dark Soulstone
stores souls using
dark energy.

Then, it corrupts
the soul with dark
magic and consumes
the target.

However, if it isn’t
destroyed, it will gain
a body that neither
ages nor dies!

I can only assume
that the Orc Warchief
will soon be reborn
with that Soulstone!

Protect me
while I destroy
the Soulstone!
Ha...

Ugh! The Soulstone’s
dark energy is
attacking me!

Exactly how many
souls are
trapped here?

If I’m not careful,
then I too may
be swallowed up!
How did this happen?!

The deceased Orc
Warchief was
captured and
consumed.

We must
defeat him!!!
Argh!
H-Help us!!!

Name: Rabid Crawler
Message:
Humans!
Kill Humans!

This will be
your grave!
Die! Die!

Thank you so much
for your help!

We must meet
back up with Russel.
Come with us!
Uh oh! YOU!!!

You want to have
a go at it?!
Bring it on!

Haha!
You guys are
full of energy!

Name: Horkan
Message:
Haha! I’m pumped up
and ready to go!

I heard that
you’ve been
picking on my guys!

I’m going to
bring you down!

Ha! Tough talking for
a mutt!
Mutt?! We’re not mutts!

All of the crystals here
are ours!

Hey! Don’t take
those crystals!

I need to make
a living!

Woof woof!
Kill! Kill!!!

Name: Right-hand Man Qupown
Message:
Hehe! Take him
to meet him!

Don’t interrupt
us!
Shrieeek!!!

I’ll send you
to hell!!!

Name: Riley, Mother of War Hounds
Message: Woof! Woof!

Woof woof
woof woof!!!

Woah! Is this a dog
or a wolf?! Sheesh!

Such a large war
hound!!!

Name: Psy
Message:
I can feel the statues’
Mana from here.

You must defeat
Kekoon and the Orcs,
then retrieve the Statue.

Name: Kekoon
Message:
What are you doing?
Take care of him
already!

Name: Mammon
Message:
Finally!
I! Am! Free!!!

Hehehehe.
Mammon is finally free!

You guys are
done for!

Mammon?!
Has the statue’s seal
been broken?

We must stop him!
Mammon cannot
be released!

Hehe.
Let me have a
taste of this world, too!

If you aim to kill me,
then you leave me no choice!

I’ll have to
kill you all!

Name: Orc
Message: Intruder! Intruder!
Get them!

Our sacrifices to Kekoon
are running away!

Name: Darian
Message:
Korum!
I finally found you.
You’ll die at my hands!

Name: Korum
Message:
What is it this time?
You’re boring me.
Deal with it yourself.

Hahaha.
For one so weak,
you put up quite a struggle!

How dare you
challenge me?
I’ll take care of you myself.

Name: Habeth the Murderer
Message:
Nice. Here’s another
one!

One more sacrifice
we can offer to him!

Risking your life for
a measly gulp of water?
Hehehe...
Fools!

You think you can face
off against my children?

Do you really think
you can fight
against this subject?

You should be
honored to face
our masterpiece!
Do not despair!

You’ll be absorbed
soon!
Wahahaha!!!

Why isn’t Habeth back
yet?!

Name: Kookan
Message: Get him!
How dare you destroy the signal fire and try to run!
I’ll rip you to shreds!
I, Kookan, will deal with you myself!
They’re coming!
Uh oh! Get out of there - fast!

Name: Dorothy
Message:
The ruins up
there seem
most suspicious.

Strangely enough,
monsters are
gathering over there.

Let’s deal with the
war hounds first, and
then we can investigate.

There’s a shiny
box over there!

There’s no doubt about it!
The Elf’s Treasure
should be there!

Look at these sparkling
gemstones! Alright!!!

Name: Fraille
Message:
Muhaha!
Hand over the
gemstones, please!
Who are you?!

That’s none of your concern.
Just hand over
the gemstones.
That’s hilarious!
Men, get him!

Stop him!
I’ll pay you double!

Huh?
There’s nothing here!

Wah!
War hounds!
Watch out!

I think we’re
in too deep!

Nice! I think we’ve found it!
There’s a cage over
there in the ruins.

Hurry!
We may not
have any time!

Name: Kidnapped Townsfolk
Message:
How did
you get here?!
Oh, Einhasad!!!

A man wearing a
dark scarf abducted
the people!

I don’t want to be here
for even a minute!

Hurry!!!
Let’s leave!!!

Skeletons!!!
They’re chasing us!

Name: Bezz
Message:
My, my, my.
It would be a shame
to lose such valuable subjects, wouldn’t it?

There are still so many
experiments to do.

Th-that guy!
Careful!

The more test
subjects I have,
the better!

Teach these guys
a lesson! Meow!

O-over there!
Our belongings are there!
Get them back! Meow!

Name: Lokita
Message:
Lookie here!
If it isn’t you cat brats!

Have you come
to offer us a bribe?
Hahaha.

Hey, men!
Catch him and kill him!

Seems you’ve brought
trusty backup!
I’ll deal with it myself!

Name: Ol Mahum
Message: Thief!!! Get him!

A thief?!
I’m just taking
back my stuff!

Mercenary, get
rid of him!

Name: Arche
Message:
There!
What’s that
huge gemstone?

I sense some
incredible Mana!
Please bring me that, too!

Thief!
Thief!
Thief!

Get him!
We must not lose
the crystal!

Name: Canu
Message:
Who dares
to touch
what’s ours?!

You will pay for your
rash actions with your life!

Name: Farlon
Message:
Those Ruin Remnants fetch
quite a high price as well!

Can you
help us?

Oh, my!
There are quite a few monsters!
Be careful!

Name: Qupown
Message:
Squaaaawk!
Who dares to
lay hand on
the relic?

Die!
Die!

You’re just like
all the others!

You’ll die here
by my hands!

We found a suspicious
box over there!

Whoa!
It’s a trap!
Be careful!

Name: Prima
Message:
Ahha! Got you!
Kill them!

How dare you look
for the Elf’s Treasure?!
Hehehe.

Your soul will be
a perfect sacrifice!

Name: Azir
Message:
Nice!
That took care of the monsters!
Shall we get to investigating?

Just in case, though...
Protect me if the
monsters come back.
Whoa, what’s this?!

Woohoo!
What luck!
Feldheim’ll be thrilled!

Hmm?
What happened?

Huh? What’s this?
Oops!
Does it seem like something’s missing?

Whoa.
Whoaaaaa.
That!!! What is that?

Did I hear
incorrectly?

Hurry!!!
Deal with
them quickly!

Hmm.
Is there anything useful here?
I don’t see anything.

We need to find something
useful to satisfy Feldheim.

Haha.
It sure is noisy.
Could you quiet down a bit?

Sigh.
Will I ever find
even one relic?

The troopers are
a big problem!

There’s no time!
Deal with them quickly!

There’s still time!
Hurry!
Rescue the hostages!

Kurk will be here soon!
Hurry!!!
Get out of here!

Oh no!
They’re coming!
I’ll take the lead!
Follow me!

Name: Kurk
Message:
How dare you
take my slaves?!
Die!

Oh no!
It’s Kurk!
This will be tough!
Be careful!

Name: Mysterious Elder
Message:
We’re under attack
by Armored Ants!
Save us!!! Arghh!

Name: Tiana
Message:
This desert is very
important for the
Trade Route.

But it’s so
dangerous that it’s
difficult for any
caravan to cross.

Currently, only the
Staris caravan uses
it. Damn them!

If it weren’t for
the Staris camp, our
caravan could claim
trade rights here.

That old
man needs
to die already.

Would you
kill Staris?
Haha! Just kidding!

In the past, when
the Empire ruled,
there was a wizard
named Beleth.

He was one of
the most powerful
Humans of all time.

Carried away by his
own power, he sought
to conquer the
entire continent.

Recognizing the
threat, the Empire
and Ivory Tower
combined their
strength

to seal
Beleth.

The dark wizard
Beleth was sealed
in the Wasteland.

Name: Emon
Message:
I see the statue was
broken recently.

Ah ha.
I understand
why it broke.

I need to check
one more thing.

A... ah!
The Basilisk?!
Be careful!!!

Oh... no... I
sprayed some
medicine, but the
dark magic energy...

It’s difficult to
completely block
out dark energy...

Fortunately,
there are merchants
gathered near here.

Let’s quicken
our pace.

Name: Valley Watcher
Message:
Hmph! The small
fries of Ivory Tower.

Name: Edina
Message:
Hmm? I’m losing
my strength!
What’s happening?

Ivory Tower fools!
You will all die!

My strength...
It’s gone!

My Mana...
It’s evaporated!
Could this bag...?

Name: Staris
Message:
What in the world...
How could something
like this...

It’s shocking to see
the Ol Mahum in a
fratricidal war...

I can’t believe the
valley rocks fell
so suddenly...

Whoa!
Be careful!!!

Name: Old Man who Almost Died
Message:
I owe a great
debt to you...

Things were hectic
earlier, but thank you.

I am Staris.
I own this place.

Got you!
Ivory Tower Wizard!
I’ll rip you to shreds!

Oh, my goodness!
Where did these
werewolves come from?!
Do something!!!

Over there!
It’s the brat from
the Ivory Tower!

Huh? Again?
He’s chasing us!
Why is he doing that?!

We cannot let her
live. Kill the wizard!

R-run! I can’t fight
right now!

I see you’re tired,
brat.

I can’t believe this!
This is a nightmare!

All wizards of the
Ivory Tower will die!
Argh!!!

Name: Void Demon
Message:
Finally found you,
Ivory Tower brat.
Hehehe...
Die!

What did you do to
my comrades?!

Curiosity killed the
cat. Hehehe.

I’m sure they went
someplace nice.
Probably. Hehehe.
You’ll join them soon.

Name: Swan
Message:
Stop right there!
Ivory Tower twerp!

You’ll interrupt us?
Hehe. Alright. I’ll
give you a present.

Behold! The fruits of
his amazing power!

It’ll devour you!
Not even your bones
will be left!

I’ll be going, so
you can have some
fun with my
pet ant. Hahaha!

Name: Mutant Armored Ant
Message:
Kreeek! Kyah!
(It seems to be very upset.)

Mhm! It’s clearly
very angry.

You can deal with this
by yourself, right?

You! Such a huge
disappointment. I can’t
believe you’re in
cahoots with Staris!

Don’t make false
accusations, you witch!

He’s a member of the
Silverlight Mercenaries!

Pay the price
for your sins!

Fine! I’ll gladly do so
after I kill you!

But are you even
prepared to pay the
price for your sins?

Out of the way,
foreigner! Don’t butt in!

Whoa! Please, don’t
do this!

Interrupt, and I’ll kill
everyone! Well,
I was going to
kill you anyway!

Aw, come on!
Why does everyone
want a piece of me?!

Name: Looter Captain
Message:
You’re the yahoo
those red-headed
cowards sent!

Come out, everyone!
Rob these guys
blind!
Oh! You’ve got some skills!

Hey! Quick!
Get everyone together!

Run away! Struggle!
Hahahaha!

Name: Staris's Minion
Message: Mew! Very bad. Mew!

How did they find us?
There was definitely
no one tailing us.

Dark Brotherhood!
Your ways are obvious!

You damn eye-sore!
You’ll be sacrificed
to Scorpion, the
terror of the desert.

Catch and bring back
as many Ol Mahum
as possible.

In the meanwhile,
I’ll prepare the cage!

Nice! Now we only
need to trap the
Ol Mahum and wait!

Hmm, looks like this
cage won’t be enough.

The plan was a success.
The Ol Mahum
are coming!
Prepare for battle!

That’s Quick Foot!
He’s incredibly fast!
We must catch him!

Name: Quick Foot
Message:
How dare you harass
my minions?!

You guys really think
you can catch me?

Oh no! The Ol Mahum are
coming to
raid us!

Defeat
them.

I’ll prepare
the experiment!

As expected,
the Stone Golem Core
is attracting
the Stone Golems!

The core’s
Mana is incredible!
Whoaaaaaa!
The Saharas are coming!

Please!
Stop them!

It’s almost over!
Just a little more!!!
Shriek!!!

Be careful...
I can’t believe a monster
like this showed up!

Quiet, Staris!
Stop barking like a dog!

Would you stop for a
sec? Be considerate
to the person who’s
been waiting! Rude!

First off, please deal
with the surrounding
Watchers.

We can’t move
freely because of
the Watchers.

The monsters seem
to be coming
from over there!
Let’s hurry!

Monsters!!!
The monsters are coming!

Where did these
things come from?

Name: Fenril
Message:
Argh!!!
Arrgh!

Fenril?
What happened?!

Argh!
Arghh!!!

Fenril, it’s me!
It’s me, Arche!

Argh!!!
Arrgh!

The monsters seem
to be coming
from over there!

We need to
remove this
Magic Circle.

First, find me
the hearts of
Wastelands Basilisks!

They’re famous for
surviving a long time
in the desert without food!

This time, find me
the hearts of
Mutant Armored Ants!

Lastly, find me a
Sahara's Heart!

My research equipment!
Help me!

The monsters
are aiming for me!

Oh no! Scoundrels!
My research equipment!!!

Show them
no mercy!!!

Beat them to
smithereens!
What’s that?!

I’ve never seen
such a large Sahara!!!

Whoa!!!
It’s coming this way!!!
Be careful!

I can see several
Skeleton Sentinels.

Please be thorough
in dealing with them!

Name: Fallen Scout
Message:
Ugh...
Save me...

Save me...
Skeletons... The Skeletons...

Argh!!!
It’s all over!
Everything is done for!

Name: Leonic
Message:
Life...
Life belongs to me.

Kill them all...
All life belongs
to me!

They say you can find
an exceptional number
of ants near an
Ant General’s nest.

Defeating as many as
possible now will make
things easier for us later.

Find the Ant General’s
nest! And be ready
to fight when you do!

We found the right one!
Prepare for battle!

Defeat all
of them and the
Ant General will appear.

It’s the Ant General!
Be on your guard -
if you’re bitten, there’s no escape!

This is
another Ant Nest!

Prepare to
fight the
ants!

Name: Shane
Message:
They say the Scripture
is to the south.

Defeat the monsters
blocking the way
to the Scripture.

Look! I see the
Scripture over there!
Hurry and take it!

Oh no! Monsters!
Prepare for battle!
Sigh. Nothing’s easy!

Argh!!!
What’s that huge ant?

Oh, Maphr!
Please protect
me!!!

The Scripture should
be to the South.

There!
I see my Scripture!
Let’s go!

Look!
There’s an egg!

Be careful!
The mother will attack
us if she’s nearby!

Oh no!
The Basilisks noticed us!
Be careful!!!

Holy-!
That’s a humongous
Basilisk!!!
There’s a place I noticed earlier!

There!
Set the bait over there!

A merchant!
Attack!

Give me everything
you’ve got!!! Ahahaha!
Hehe. Look at this!

We’ll lure them once
more and deal with
the root of the issue!

Goods!!! Attack!!!
This is a raid!
Let’s take it!!!

Name: Kashtray
Message:
Ha! Imbeciles!
Can’t believe they fell for our trap!

How dare you
make a fool of my minions?!
I’ll make you pay!

He should be
at the Inner Post.

Let’s defeat
the Ol Mahum
nearby!

Wow.
Not bad!

Let’s deal with
Traman quickly, too!

Name: Traman
Message:
Hehehe!
Foolish Human!
Back again?

You don’t think it’ll
be as easy as last time, do you?

Hey, Dorothy!
Go home and
let your mommy kiss
your boo-boos!
Arrrr.
Kill!

I see you’ve
brought a match
for me this time!

Will you be
able to beat me?

Name: Nine
Message: The cubs like fresh meat so come quickly when you find some meat!
Oh! Please bring back something tough the cubs can chew on!
The legs of Armored Ants would be perfect!
Your pet seems to take after you!
Defeat the nearby Saharas to get some fine sand!
We need wood to build a wall!
We can bring the ones we left behind when we were chased off by monsters.

Name: Sabero
Message: What if we catch and sell this Black Bear at the Trading Post?

Name: Ribero
Message: A wonderful tomorrow and bright future await us!
Uh oh! We’ll take this matter into our own hands!
NO!!! That’s MY Black Bear!
Careful! The cubs are coming! Slow down little ones. Eat slowly.
Found one! This guy seems to have escaped on his own! Quite impressive, isn’t it?!
Thank goodness! I found another one!
I see Team Bear! I’ll be hiding but please be sure to save the remaining Black Bear cubs!
Nice! Let’s walk the cubs for a bit while we’re at it.
The cubs can’t keep up if you go that quickly!
This sure is strange. There seem to be more of them. Am I imagining it?
Phew. We’ve returned to the campsite. I’ll take them to the enclosure.

Find the girl!
Krrrk!

Name: Lieutenant Vacen
Message:
Quiet!
Off with you,
damn Orcs!

Name: Young Soldier Mike
Message:
There are still
more Orc
Escorts remaining.

Let’s go around
since there may
be more.

There! I see a
huge Orc!

Why’s there a
picture of a girl
in this letter?

Almost as though
she’s wanted...

Look!
The bounty
is no joke!

You can take the
letter, but in return...

Can I take this
Orc Captain’s head?

Everyone will
be proud
of me, right?

Name: Breka Orc Ranger
Message:
Krkk! I’m positive!
That’s him!!!

Name: Captain Karrack
Message:
Oh, yeah? Hey, you!
Mr. Arrogant! Hand
over the captain’s head
and the picture!

Name: Marina
Message:
Be careful!
They’re calling
for backup!

Name: Hunter Kakish
Message:
The prisoners are
escaping! Capture them!
Don’t let them escape!

Name: Lost Child
Message:
Perhaps...
Has anyone seen
my younger sister?

Please look for
my sister...

We went for a stroll
together, but

a bad wizard
tried to grab us.

When I managed
to get away, I
noticed that my
sister wasn’t
with me.

And... I was
captured by Lizardmen.

I hope she’s
alright... Elie...

Name: Guard Captain Thano
Message:
There will still be
Lizardmen around. Be
careful looking
for her!

Good luck, Leia!
I hope you find your
younger sister!

Name: Leto Lizardman
Message:
Thieves! Shhk! Shhk!
Where did you hide it!
Shhk!

Name: Guard
Message:
Who are you
calling a thief,
you looters?

Name: Sticky Entomo
Message:
How dare you, a key,
not even a Human,
resist!

Come along quietly!
It’s not like we
can kill you.
Get the girl!

Name: Mystic Zaab
Message:
Destroy the Evil
Summoning Stone!

Monsters will continue
to appear if you
don’t destroy
the Summoning Stone!

Name: Vascilious
Message:
Hahaha!
Shall we start
playing for real?

You
arrogant brat!
Die!

Quite a cunning
trick you used!
Dark Brotherhood!!!

You may be ahead,
but you won’t get
what you want!

Since they went to
Cruma, it’s obvious
where they’re headed!

Name: Leia
Message:
Shrieek!!!
Save me!!!

Name: Leia
Message:
Go away!!! Go away!
Save me!

Name: Orc Captain
Message:
Kill that Human!
Kill!

Uh... Wah!!!
H-help!

Wow! Your skills are
quite formidable!
Great! Have a taste,
you Orcs!

Name: Leia
Message:
I’m alright! Let’s
go somewhere we
won’t be seen!

Name: Krush
Message:
Shhhk!
Has your bravado
driven you mad?

You will pay for the
deaths of my minions
with your life! Shhhk!

I’ll massacre the
entire town! Shhhk!

Name: Varash
Message:
Did you kill
my minions?

Shhhk!
Do you want to
join this one?

Actually!
I’ll let you live! Shhhk!

It just so happens
we need a target
for shooting practice! Shhhk!

Squaaaaaawk!
Pesky mercenaries!
Let’s see how you
handle this!

Name: Lucas
Message:
You should be able
to find some evidence!

What if something
bad happens
because of this
ruckus we’re causing?

I saw a
huge Lizardman
over there!

Name: Leto Lizardman Sentry
Message: What do you want? What are you bugging me for? Shhhk!

So you want me to kill you?
Terrific!
I was getting bored! Shhhk!

Shhhk! Quick! We must
go! Thrush has
summoned us!

This guy’ll be a piece of cake!
Shhhk! Let’s kill him before we go!

Name: Thrush
Message:
What in the world?!
What happened to you all?!
Shhhk!

Name: Leto Lizardman Fighter
Message:
Shhhk! We’ll
take care of it,
Thrush!

Ahaha! You guys want to
show off your abilities? Shhhk!
Leave it to us! Shhhk!

You fools!
I can’t believe I trust you!
Shhhk!

Hey!
Everyone! Get out here!
Fresh meat!

Did you guys not hear me?!
Why won’t this
guy die?!

Name: Evna
Message:
Can you hear me?
I’ve cast a
simple incantation.

I’m trying to be
helpful by searching
for Krush.

I’ll let you know when I
catch wind of Krush.

An individual with
a strong life force
has caught my eye!

It’s not far!
Go ahead!
Hmm... not bad? Shhhk!

Killing you slowly will
bring me much
amusement!

Hahaha! How about it?
You want to die, right?!

Eliminate Varash’s
minions.

They’ve committed
heinous crimes!

Name: Varash's Elite Soldier
Message:
Aha! This is mine!
I found this one first!
Shhhk!

Name: Tony
Message:
Please don’t kill me!
I’ll give you all I have!

First to kill gets the kill!
No dibs! Shhhk!

Alright! Let’s make
a bet! I’ll put a hole
in its head! Shhhk!
S-save me!

Name: Screash
Message:
I can’t believe you’ve
resorted to violence
after coming all the
way here! Shhhk!

Your wickedness
ends here,
Screash.

Ugh! You’re so uptight!
I haven’t even killed
200 of them!
Oh, my goodness!
Can’t forgive you! Screash!

Why? Didn’t you say
that Eva was merciful?
Shhhk?

Even if the goddess Eva
forgives you!

You’ll die by
my hands today!

For a priest of Eva,
you sure talk like
Gran Kain! Shhhk!
Shut up!

Tired yet, priest of
Eva? Shhhk!
Not yet! Huff... Huff...

Shhhk! Hehehe.
Your escort looks
tired too!

Well, come on then!
Shhhk! How funny!
Hahaha!

Wait! Someone’s
coming!

Name: Morgoh
Message:
Hehehe...
Just as Elizabeth
said, right?

We found the child
thanks to you.
This is your cue
to leave.

Did they notice us
following them?
Tsk, take care!

Hand over the key -
and your lives!

Name: Leia
Message: Shriek!

They’re not normal!
Be careful!

Name: Pavel
Message: Take a look around at our surroundings.
There should be some specialized hunters!
The academic world considers these guys a different species.
But I have a different opinion.
They must be the same species as the Enraged Wasps!
You’ve got to find me a sample!
The especially large one is a mutant.
I want to find the reason for the mutation! I’ll leave it to you!

Name: Theron
Message: Garok is the oldest among the Breka Orc Fighters.
The Breka Orcs live and die on the battlefield.
They rarely live to die of old age.
The older a Breka Orc Fighter is,
the stronger that fighter is.
Oh, I forgot something important. There is a Berserker among them.
He’s very strong, so you should be careful!

Name: Garok
Message: Yawn! This is terrific - I was getting bored!
I haven’t been able to kill enough yet today!
Hang in there! Make this enjoyable for me!

Name: Leto Lizardman Archer
Message: I can’t believe you’re using violence here! Shhhk.
All this laughing is making me feel weak. Shhhk.
Shhhk! Has your bravado driven you mad?
I’ll kill you as payment for killing my minions! Shhhk!
I’ll massacre the entire town! Shhhk!
It’s time to practice archery! Shhhk!
Shhhk! Where do you want to be hit? You damn no-scales!
Who sent you?! How dare you attack me?! Shhhk!
Shhhk! Fire! Fire your arrows!
I’ll turn you into shish kebabs! Shhhk!
Who is this brat bothering me? Shhhk!
Hehe. This will be a perfect test for my new curse! Shhhk!
How ridiculous! You will die! Shhhk!
Everyone, attack! Shhhk!
Shhhk! I’ll make your bones dance like seaweed!

Name: Mechillen
Message: The more aggressive one is a male.
It may attack us in an effort to protect its group.
Usually, the males are no good for cooking.
But the Alpha Male is different.
Please capture the Alpha Male
if you have a chance.
You may irritate them if you focus too much on hunting.
You’ll know it’s time to stop when the Vampire Bats start attacking.
Yes! Don’t let even a single one escape!
Krrrk! What do you want, nerd? Want to die?!

Name: Breka Orc Ranger Captain
Message: Be ashamed! You fools!
Did you really lose to this wuss?!
I’ll personally put their head on a pike!

Name: Laris
Message:
What a relief!
It’s a comrade!

Elizabeth! What
are you thinking?!

Theodore! I
don’t want you to
come here and die.

Killing you slowly
brings me such joy!
Hahaha!

Damn it!
I’m sure the spy
already got to it!

The only ones
who went this
way were Horace, Laris,
and Mitereu.

One of those three
must be a spy!

Then... Leia is in
great danger!
Hasten the pace!

Ahh! Be careful!
It’s a Skeleton Pursuer!

Name: Horace
Message:
Hehehe. Do you see
this? I belong to the
Dark Brotherhood!

Elizabeth!
Look forward to it!

I’ll get rid
of these guys!
Hehehe!

The strength of
the Giants lies
dormant within
Cruma Tower.

There are many
searching for the
secret to
that strength.

Even Hardin is
highly interested
in it.

I’ve called upon
a friend
to help you.

I’ve got to go
after Elizabeth!

I’ll beat her to a
pulp when I see her!

Running again?!
Stop right there!!!

Hehe! Come
play at the tower
when you have time.

I hope you have
a good time

getting the tower
key from my men.
Hahaha!

Over there!
There are people
in front of the ruins!
Who is it?!

Hand over the key!
I’m busy!
Damn it... Stop them!!!

You just watch!
I’ll find the other
key, too!

Name: Leia
Message:
Here, I feel my
abilities slowly
returning.

Name: McCrane
Message:
I can’t hand over
the key
to you fools!

Fight well!
I’m speaking
with Leia.

Kill them all
except for the child!

Name: Leia
Message: Give me back my little sister!

Hehe... Don’t worry.
She’s being treated
well.

You’ll have to
come along, too!
Step back! Leia!

Name: Leia
Message:
It’s a must if we
want to stop
the hallucinatory
effects of the
swamp poison!

You’re not bad! Why
do you need
such a thing?

Name: Leia
Message:
There! Over there!
Let’s follow them!

Name: Magikos
Message:
Tsk... Have we
been discovered?
They’re so stubborn!

Keep them
away from us!
Kill them all!

What? Take me, too!
Theodore!

Aren’t you
late, Theodore?

This would disappoint
Hardin, wouldn’t it?

Don’t touch the
relic, Elizabeth!
Nothing good will
come out of it
for you!

For Hardin?
Or for me?
If not us,
then maybe...
For you?

Hahaha. What will
you do?
It wasn’t Elie.

Poor Elie will need
an antidote for the
Swamp poison,
don’t you know? Hahaha!

Oh, another failure.
What will you do?
The clock is ticking.

Stop it, Elizabeth!
I can’t stand to
watch this anymore!

Hmph! It’s my choice,
Theodore! Who do
you think you are?

Let’s put an end to
this game of tag.

This has gotten
boring since you
all can’t keep up.

They are subjects of
Cruma Tower!
Be careful!

Name: Marsh Stakato Slave
Message:
Warning!
Intruder alert!

We. Will.
Protect.
Our. Group.

Name: Zyrnna
Message:
Group is
under attack.

Name: Marsh Stakato Envoy
Message: Eliminate the intruder!
Who are you?

I am Zyrnna,
the Marsh Queen!

This is our land!
You are intruders!

I won’t let
you live!

Collect plenty of
Dark Essence.

Name: Arcane
Message:
Damn it!
We can’t escape!

Who summoned me?
I want to see
your ugly mug!

I’m not ugly!
At least,
not as ugly as you!

How dare you
insult me?! I’ll
make sure your death
is extra-painful!

Won’t kill
swiftly...

That sort of thing...
That’s my specialty...

Run! As fast as you can!
I’m angry!
It’s impossible.

Wahh!
Leave me alone!!!

Name: Skeleton Pursuer
Message: Uhhhh...

Calling
me...

This side effect
is on the weak side.

I...
Want...
You...

Ah...
Hungry...

The desires of the
dead are
especially dangerous.

Name: Liam
Message: This curse is... almost like...

Sweet...
So sweet!!!

My curse
gives pleasure,
not pain.

The dark entities
will be especially
difficult to resist.

I can’t stop!
You! I’ll swallow
you whole!

That seems physically
impossible...

Name: Guard Ligus
Message:
Huh? Is it Horace?
Why is he wearing
such dark clothes?

Collect and return with
bone powder from
the Skeleton Pursuers.

Pummel them to
smithereens. Simple,
right?
It’s Ronde. Destroy it.

Name: Ronde
Message:
Who goes there?!
Who summoned me?!

Can’t you tell from
the situation?

Right! I’ll rip out your
heart and squash it!

I... like...
the sounds of that.

Arghh!
You arrogant brat!

The summon gate
won’t shut.
This is tricky... Hmm...

Name: Skeleton Scout
Message: Ah... Target...

Kill...
...

For skeletons,
they’re very articulate.

I...
will slaughter
you...

That would’ve sounded cooler
if I said it to
an opponent
I could beat...

Name: Ancelotti
Message:
We’ve got to take out
some of these Marsh Stakato slaves.

They are the
lowest class within the
Zyrnna group.

They’re also the most
important foundation.

Step back when
the time is right!
They’ll counterattack soon!

Gasp!
W-we’re alive! Ahh...
We’ve got to take out some of these Marsh Stakato slaves.
They are the lowest class within the Zyrnna group.
They’re also the most important foundation.
Warning! Intruder alert!
We. Will. Protect. Our. Group.
Group is under attack.
Step back when the time is right! They will counterattack soon!
I am Zyrnna, the Marsh Queen!
This is our land! You are the intruder!
I won’t let you live!
Collect plenty of Dark Essence.
How dare you insult me?! I’ll make sure your death is extra-painful!
Won’t kill... swiftly...
That sort of thing is my specialty...
Run! As fast as you can! I’m angry!
Wahh! Leave me alone!!!
Ugh...
Calling me...
This side effect is on the weak side.
I... Want... You...
Hungry...
The desires of the dead are especially dangerous.
This curse is... almost like...
Sweet... So sweet!!!
My curse gives pleasure, not pain.
The dark entities will be especially difficult to resist.
I can’t stop! You! I’ll swallow you whole!
That seems physically impossible...
If everyone’s here, let’s get started.
Target... Kill...
For skeletons, they’re very articulate.

Name: Horror Mist Reaper
Message: You’re despicable! Are you an underling of Einhasad?!
I’ll destroy this despicable furnace!

Name: Mist Terror Reaper
Message: Destroy it! Destroy the furnace!
I feel dark energy all the way from here!
Are you alright?!
To think you were in cahoots with that underling of Einhasad! I’ll punish you!
Help me meow! I’m being attacked meow!
I’ll hide carefully.
These guys are really fur-rocious!
Watch out fur the big one!
This’ll go on fur-ever
if we don’t take out the big one! Get him meow!
I’m thinking of looking over there, too!
Gasp! I would’ve been dead if I went ahead!

Name: Swamp Ghoul
Message: How dare you interrupt our break?!
Gasp! S-scary!!!
I’ll look for it! Hang in there a little longer!
We need to deal with those guys over there, too!
Do I strike fear into your foolish hearts?
I’ll make sure you scram and stay scrammed!
They’re still nearby! Look again, meow!
Hiss! That big guy’s stuff looks like it’s the best!
That one! Get me that one!
More Dark Essences are required.

Name: Vague
Message:
Ugh!
I don’t want to
hunt icky spiders!

I was chasing a big,
juicy rabbit when all
of a sudden, a spider
appeared out of nowhere!

Tanor and the
Ol Mahum have been
at odds for
generations.

Recently, a war
broke out
between them.

The Tanor were
close to victory,
but the war
dragged on

because the Dark
Brotherhood joined
in support of the Ol Mahum.

The war will
create
dark energy,

which Beleth will
surely claim for himself.

You can see why the
Dark Brotherhood
doesn’t want this
war to end.

We must put an end
to this war through
Tanor’s victory.

Name: Tanor Knight Recruit
Message: Over here!!!

Let me
meet the chief.
I don’t want
any trouble.

What’s a doomed fool
like you want
to meet the chief for?

Haha, nice! This is
what makes
Tanor so great!

Ptooey!
Damn you! Die!
Release the beasts!

Name: Durzel
Message:
Tanor doesn’t see
much difference
between friends
and enemies.

That is, as long as
you’re not an
Ol Mahum.

Negotiations are
simple! You just
have to beat
these guys!

Name: Tanor Soldier
Message:
Who’s there?!
We’ll burn you alive
when we catch you!

How cool is this?
These guys
don’t even care
about putting out fires!

If the chief refuses
Hardin’s offer...

I don’t even want to
think about what
will happen to the
Tanor next...

Name: Tribal Chief Kankoon
Message:
Did you think I
would agree to such
a rude request?!

Kill
them all!

Yes, I know.
Tanor!
Go ahead and resist.

Don’t look down
on Tanor!

Of course not.
If I did, I would
have killed
you already.
YOU!!!

Name: Tanor Priest
Message:
How dare you attack
our chief?!
Kiss your
lives goodbye!

Hold on!
We’ve just here
to negotiate!

We must kill anyone
and everyone who
attacks our chief!

As expected!
Classic Tanor
negotiation tactics!

Oh, brave Tanor.
We have a
common enemy!

Are you aware the
Dark Brotherhood
has aided the
Ol Mahum?

Hmm...
The Dark Brotherhood?

Well, well.
We have much
to discuss.

What are all those
Tanor doing?
Have they come
to see us off?

Name: Tribal Chief’s Group
Message:
It’s them!
Kill! Kill them!

Oh no! The opposition!
Be careful!

Name: Warchief Kankoon
Message:
The chief is wrong!
You don’t have any
right to negotiate.

We’ll destroy you
by order of
chief Kankoon!

We’ll rip you to
shreds, just like
the Ol Mahum!!!

We always
kill our enemies!

That is the way of
Tanor!
What are you scheming with the chief?!

Why did you steal
the Relic of Tanor?

The chief agreed
to cooperate with us!
Sheesh!

You’re our enemies!
Not friends!

A worthy opponent!
I’ll bring my weapon!

Hardin always
wanted the
Relic of Tanor.

He said that one
needs to earn
the trust of the Tanor Chief

to acquire that
power. Seems he
was successful.
Who is it?!

How dare you
lay hands on the
subjects?

You will pay for
foolish actions with
your lives!

Name: Borys
Message:
Please...
I hope they’re alright...

Hey!
It’s me, Borys!
Your friend!

Name: Necross
Message:
Ha! Do you think
they’re going to
recognize you?

Magic is not
such a weak thing.
Hey! Dark Brotherhood!

Excellent! That
anger! The dark
energy!

Let your hatred run
wild! Wonderful!
Hahaha!

Find Durzel.
He comes and goes
as he pleases, but
I’m getting worried.

No! We’re a step late!
Be careful!

Name: Chief Alarac
Message:
I’m back! Die!
You Tanor-alikes!

Quickly!
Destroy the Soulstone!

The Ol Mahum will
come running!

Huh? Who’s that?
Are they in cahoots with Tanor?

Name: Ol Mahum Vanguard
Message: We’ll take care of it, Ol B’Khan sir!

What’s going on?! You can’t deal with
one pest?!

We’ll be late to
hunting Tanor!
Stop messing around!

Go!
I’ll kill you myself if
you can’t deal with this!

Name: Ol Mahum Trooper
Message:
Oh no! Kill them!
Ol B’Khan is angry!
Argh! Die!

Not too shabby.
Who sent you?

How dare you
try to fight me.

Tanor or not,
it makes no difference!

I’ll kill you and
drink ale from your skull!

Name: Bartum
Message:
Tartan over there
is looking away.
This is our chance!
Let’s move quickly.

Name: Tartan
Message:
Who is it?!
Quit your yammering!
You’re good for nothing!

Argh!
I can’t move!

Name: Tartan’s Minion
Message: Tartan?!

They’re using some kind of trickery!
Everyone, be careful!
Protect Tartan!

Hurry!
Defeat the minions!

Oh no!
Don’t kill
my minions!
Argh!
I’ll rip out your throat with my teeth!

T-to think he
broke the spell! Argh!

You’re the criminal!
You damn fanatic!

Damn it...
You!
Why...

We got some very
useful information
from the Ol Mahum.

Name: Thaartan
Message:
Hey!
Who left
this wagon here?

Arghh! What!?
Who’s there?
What are you doing?!

Name: Thaartan's Minion
Message:
Thaartan,
what’s wrong?!

No mercy
for intruders!

Thaartan has
been attacked!

Ah! This is embarrassing! Over here!
Release me and we can talk!
There’s no use in talking!

What are you saying?!
Hey! Hey!
Release me!

You damn
bugs!
Faster!

Name: Lieutenant Thartos
Message: Thaartan!

I’ve been hit with magic!
I can’t move!

You guys are despicable,
using a dirty trick like that!

Rescue
Thaartan!
Everyone attack!

You thug!
I’m innocent!
This is ridiculous!

We need
to aim for when
Tutan is outside alone.
Let’s go.

Name: Tutan
Message:
You’re suspicious!
What business
do you have here?
Augh! A restraining spell?!

We’re under attack!
Get the one
in the dark clothes!

They’re planning to
break my concentration!
I’ll leave you with the defense.

Name: Thartos
Message:
Tutan
was done in by a spell?!

I’ll give you a taste, too!
How dare you do that to Tutan?!

Oh, no!
A shaman’s curse
is difficult to deal with!

Name: Ashley
Message: Cull the Black Leopards
and set up the decoy.
We don’t want anything strange getting caught with the decoy.
Did you set up the decoy? Has Sharon appeared?
There’s is a female Black Leopard called Sharon.
We need to catch Sharon!
Has Sharon appeared?
You’ve got to catch her, okay?
They’ll gather all at once when you set up the decoy.
If you can deal with multiples at once, then give it a try.
This should be enough.
Let’s go to catch Tartan!
Who’s there? What’s all this ruckus?!
You must defeat Tartan’s minions first if you want to catch him.
Who sent you? I’ll deal with you myself!
Well done! Defeat Tartan!
We’ve located Thaartan.
Huh? Back again, Priest?
Thaartan! Come quietly!
I’ve told you many times that you’ve got this all wrong!
Tell that to Maphr when you see her!
You are so beyond words!
Since discussion’s getting us nowhere, I’ll let my fists talk!
Ha! Finally, you reveal your true nature!
I’m tired! Buzz off already.
Idiot! It’s not me!
Tutan’s surrounded by minions! We’ll deal with them first.
Huh? What’s this spell?
Tutan! You’re under arrest!
You again! I’ll make sure you never harass Tanor again!
Damn - a moron with conviction!
Ah! The Red Truffle’s over there! We’ve got to grab it!
Oh no! Are you alright? These Venomous Spiders are dangerous!
Watch your back!
Take a risk and get better ingredients!
Let’s be a bit more greedy!
We’ve found Ol B’Khan! Hurry!
Huh? Who’s this guy? Is he in cahoots with Tanor?
Stupid vanguard!
Let’s go, Troopers! I’ll lead the way!
Yes sir, Ol B’Khan! Raaaarrr!
Did you perhaps see Mitchell over there? I thought I saw something!
Who are you? What are you doing here?
Uh oh, we’ve been caught! It’s every man for himself!

Name: Ol Mahum General
Message: Where are the officers? They’re slacking off!
Were you playing with this guy here?
Whoa! What’s that guy doing here?!
You’ve got to learn when to quit!
What’s the point if you die?

Name: Ol Mahum Commander
Message: Someone’s causing a disturbance!
Stop them from escaping!

Name: Ol Mahum Commanding Officer
Message: Hey! Hey! You dimwit! Do I have to step in?
Surround them! Attack from behind!
Look around the wagon!
No need for chit-chat. If anyone gets in your way, get rid of them!
Who’s there? Scram!
We found signs of Real Goods!

Name: Tanor Scout
Message: What are all these boxes for? Who are you guys?!
This is where you stop, you criminals!
What are you talking about? Get out of here, you lout!
Don’t hesitate! Attack!

Name: Tanor Shaman
Message: Enemy spotted! We’re under attack!
Ol B’Khan’s minions! Over there!
Well then! Let’s meet today’s quota, okay?
This one’s mine!
Uh oh, we’ve been caught! It’s every man for himself!

So many have died
unjust deaths
on this land.

There was one
who refused to fall
and struck a deal
with the Demon.

When he was human,
he was called
Guillotine...

Once revived,
he became
worse than
any Demon.

As expected!
It’s the
Black Willow!
Be careful!

Name: Murmur
Message:
Who dares disturb
my slumber?

It’s normal for
Black Willow
to not be here!

Name: Mandragora
Message: Shriek!!!

Argh! What’s that noise?!
My eardrums are
about to explode!

Huh...? The sound is
attracting attention!

Be careful!
The Undead
are coming!

Name: Vindictive Killer
Message:
You too will
die in vain,
just as I did!

Oh, my!
It wasn’t just a
tree, but instead a
willow! Be careful!

They’re coming!
We must guard
the furnace!

I’m surprised to
see you here,
Hardin.

Name: Captain Mania
Message:
...is it him?
The one who’s
bothering us?

You seeds of
darkness sure do
funny things.

Do you really think
you can do anything
with skills like yours?

Captain Mania, I’ll
leave you to deal
with this fogey.
Your lord beckons.

You cannot stop the
coming of the lord!

What? Has he
become a god of
some kind? You’re
merely a minion of a Demon!
Shut up!!!

Name: Nerkas Necromancer
Message:
Watch where you
put your hand,
you inferior wretch!

Hush! This way!
Next to the stairs.

Name: Guillotine of Death
Message:
The seal
will soon be undone.

Bring me
their heads!

It’s dangerous!
Even for a
a powerful wizard
like you, Hardin!

He’s the one
who fought and sealed
the ancient heroes!

There! The Ruined Keep!
There’s a 
barrier!
Get ready! One!
Two!
Three!

Full speed ahead!
Retake the
keep!

The furnace is
damaged. Do you
think the furnace
will hold for
long enough?

It should hold for a
moment! Run quickly!

The energy of death
is enough to make
my hair stand up!

Treasure or not,
it’s more important
for us to survive!

Uh... The Undead
are coming!!!
S-stop them!

Meow! Save me!
Wahhh!!!

They’re coming
again! Wahh!

The army of death
is here!!!

Guillotine may not
be able to emerge,
but his army surely
will!!! We must
guard the furnace!
I-I’ll h-help too!

Your efforts will be
for naught!
Soldiers! Bring me
their heads!

We’ll use them to
decorate the banners!
We will make
my return known!
Be careful!!!

Hardin...! W-we
can’t hold out
any longer...!

If we fall, Giran is
doomed! Hang in
there! Hold on!

Just hold on for 10
more seconds! Hold
on like your life
depends on it!

Damn it!
What are you doing?!
Put the fire out!

Name: Roy
Message:
D-don’t touch it...
Give it here...
The Caravan Leader
will be upset...

Name: Neville
Message: Something’s surrounding me!
My goodness! I thought it wouldn’t attack if I didn’t touch it!
Who’s that? They look dangerous!

Name: Dread Specter
Message: Arghh...
Ah! Damn it! I shouldn’t have come here!
This way! I have a bad feeling about this!
Argh! Back again? I’m about to go crazy! Help me!
T-that one is a bit larger, isn’t it? It looks different from the other ones!

Name: Twisted Doom Servant
Message: Hehehehe...
D-did you hear that? He’s laughing. Ugh... I don’t like it!

Name: Yumaeri
Message: There should be many Dicor of Sorrow around the Flower of Sadness.
Eliminate any Dicor that may be of danger.
There! I see the Flower of Sadness!
Protect me while I gather the flower.
Whoa! Help me!!!
D-defeat the Mandragora!
I’ve never seen a Dicor that big! Are you sure you can beat it?!

Name: Carmen
Message: Defeat the Dicor of Despair.
Wait.
Something’s odd.
This Dicor has been corrupted by strange energy.
I’ll look for its source.
Found it! The energy is coming from that strange post.

Name: Dryed
Message: Well, well... A guest!
Welcome. Do you also want to be part of my garden?
Well, well! I can’t believe you destroyed my precious flowers!
I can’t bear to watch any more of this!
I’ll deal with you myself!
According to the Wizard, a Reaper called Repus has consumed the most souls!
Repus! Find Repus!
The spirits are coming! Be careful!

Name: Repus
Message: What a tasty-looking soul!
Die!!!
Thank you so much for your help!
There is an Innocent Spirit on the way to Kamel.
Defeating them will be advantageous for you in battle.
I-it’s Kamel.
Look at that bloodstained blade!
They seem awful to fight against.
Woah!!! The spirits are coming!
Kamel! It’s Kamel the Butcher!

Name: Toat
Message: Roarrr! How dare you set foot in my sanctuary?
I’ll rip you to shreds!
You defeated the Necromancers - not too shabby!
Now, behold the power that Guillotine bestowed upon me!
Souls! Fresh souls!

Name: Inore
Message: Please don’t fall prey to them!

Name: Tortured Specter
Message: Pain... Only pain keeps me alive...
What other proof of existence is there...?
They need to be put to rest.
This Dicor of Despair seems to be under something’s control.
I’ll look for the controller.
Found it! The magic device over there is controlling the Dicor.
We need to destroy it.
Oh no! The freed Dicor are coming for us!
Be careful!

Name: Frantic Soldier
Message: H-Help us!!!
Arrghhh!
Reaper!!! The Reapers are coming after us!
Oh. Please make sure you have the Spirit’s chain!
After all, we should console the townsfolk!
Watch out! Spirits!
S-save me!
Uowaaaaaah!
Wahh!
I won’t die!

Name: Innocent Spirit
Message: Shrieeeek!
It’s the undead who guard the incinerator!
No time to be hesitating!
Defeat them now!
Argh!!!
Hardin! Hardin!
How dare you! The Soulstone!!!
Army of Undead, get rid of them!!!
They’re coming, careful! You must protect me!

Name: Corps Leader Pugg
Message: What are you doing at my incinerator!
I’ll cut off your limbs and burn them!
Guillotine will surely be happy!
It’s Pugg! Careful!
He’s the cruelest among the Army of Undead!
However, he is a bit stupid!
Prevent him from coming close!

Name: Apostle Erzael
Message: Fools! I can’t believe they were killed by this lot!
You cannot destroy Guillotine’s Soulstone!
Demons! Heed my call!
An apostle?! Things sure are a mess!
There isn’t much left! Take care of your soul!
He’s a demon that eats souls!
Focus!
Hmm? What is this dark energy?!
Careful! We’ve got a tough one coming!!!
Nice! The Soulstone has been destroyed!!!
Now is the chance! Guillotine’s Soulstone is destroyed!
We need to defeat him completely!
Use the Summoning Stone to follow me!

See the
Flat Mushrooms here?

They’re my secret!
Ordinary people don’t
know about them.

We’ve got to
pick and take
all of them!

Keep this
a secret from other people!

These ones are
really high-quality!

Hey... Does that girl
over there look like
Alice?

Purr... Could it really
be Alice?

Name: Alice
Message:
I paid up
last time!
Leave me alone!
Bring back Vehin!

What’s happening?!
You jerks!
Let Alice go!

Take this money!
Bug off!

Name: Tax Officer
Message:
H-huh? Oh no!
What are you doing?!
Why aren’t you dealing with this?!

Name: Giran Guard Captain
Message: Hmm. How bothersome.

Vehin was
drafted and
taken away.

Sigh! How did
things turn out this way?!

Well, if you’re heading
to town,

I can
lead the way!

Don’t worry too much,
Alice!
Money is my specialty!

I’ll be back after
selling my goods.
It won’t take long!

In the past, I saved
Vehin and Pan
from certain death.

Ever since,
Pan has been coming
to see us regularly.

When the three
of us hang out,
time really flies...
Hehe...

Vehin would be happy
to know that
Pan came...

I’ve asked the
Elder to help
with finding Vehin.
I need to see him.

Name: Botanist
Message:
This land
turned barren
because of Medusa.

We needed
a way to stop the
curse of petrification.

The experiment has
already succeeded.
We merely need the right materials.

If successful,
we will not only
be able to take preventative measures

but also
reverse the
petrification.

Of course, we’ll
need Sandflower grass.
Over there! It’s Vehin!!!

Vehin! Drink this!
It’s a potion 
to stop petrification.

Name: Vehin
Message:
Really?! We’re safe!
Thanks, Alice!!!

So... make juice from it
and mix it with the potion?

Name: Vehin's Comrade
Message:
Huh?
What happened to me?
Is the petrification over?

Ah! An alpha Red Bear!
We have to catch it meow!

It may be tough,
but we can’t give up!

Name: Medusa
Message:
Sisters!
Stenoa will be here soon!

We can’t let
the garden
defilers escape!

Huh. I guess
there was something
more important
to Pan than money.

Just like us,
ordinary people.
Come to think of it, this is...
...my hometown.

The place I left
after I became
a Dark Elf...

Who besides Beleth
could have
this sort
of energy...?

Name: Seal Sentry
Message:
Intruder!
The price of arrogance
is death!

It’s the Seal Sentry!
Be careful!

Why is the
Seal Sentry here?!

I heard the
Blood Queen is
connected to
the creation of the Dark Elves.

I don’t know much
about
Dasparion...

Just his
name.

The cloak from before
might belong to
Dasparion.

Name: Blood Queen
Message:
Hahaha...
I smell his scent
on you...

Did Dasparion
seal you?

You and my most
loathed Human
are deeply connected.

Did Dasparion
send you
to kill me?

I guess he’s not
satisfied with simply
betraying me!

I don’t know
what you’re talking about.
I don’t know Dasparion.

Hahaha.
You really don’t
know anything.
That sure is funny!

Hmmm... I wonder
how long the secret
will last? Dasparion! Haha!

Hahaha!
Finally, some prey!
I’ll swallow you whole! Haha!

Hmm?! But...
This sensation...?
C-could it be?

It’s him! It’s HIM!
Aha!

Well, Theodore,
did she say anything unusual?

Say... about
the wizard
who sealed her.
The worst situation?

Hehe... Isn’t
that something the
Lizardmen should worry about?

But...
where did that cheapskate
Theodore go?

That punk! He
teleported
without me
that time in Cruma Tower!

I could’ve
caught Elizabeth...

Name: Langk Lizardman
Message:
Shhhk! Arrogant punk.
Do you want to die?!

Name: Langk Lizardman Shaman
Message:
How dare you break the totem?!
When I catch you,
I’ll break you!

I didn’t break the totem!
Jeez!

Name: Langk Lizardman Recruit
Message:
I-intruder?
I’ll show you the
results of my training! Shhhk!

Oh no! The Lizardmen have
caught our scent!

Conserve your
energy! You still have
to face the chief!

Name: Langk Lizardman Warchief
Message:
You punks! I’ll
skin you alive!
Aymel? Where is it?

I don’t know! You think I’ve
just been laying around?

Look there!
Are those people
being held captive?

Hey! You
smelly uglies!
Do you ever wash your scales?!

Shhhk!
Grab that girl!
I won’t let you escape!
Shhhk!

Hahaha.
You really think you can catch me?

After her! Shhhk!
Catch
her! Shhhk!

Ah... That girl...
She’s definitely the
best taunter
in the Silverlight Mercenaries...

Do you see that?
It’s the Cougar Leader!

That’s definitely
premium leather!

Don’t let it get away!
Get it for me meow!

There! Over there!
Do something about it!

Huh?!
Where’s my bow?!

Name: Ominous Willow
Message: Hot! Hot! This ignorant fool!
I’ll squash you with my roots!

Name: Shrieking Treant
Message: Fire! Fire! This guy is crazy!
Shriek!!! Who is it?!
I’ll teach you what happens when you play with fire!
Are you in league with the soldiers chasing me?
How dare you threaten me with fire?
I’ll hang your head on the end of my pike!
Hehehe. A soul! I smell the scent of tasty soul!

Name: Balthazar
Message: I smell souls! Whoa!
Where is it? Where are these souls coming from?
All mine! Mine! Hahahaha!
Your soul is especially large and beautiful!
Give me your soul! I’ll take it for myself! Hahaha!

The specters have gathered.
They smell
the living.

They’ll attack
to take over bodies.

Name: Cowboy
Message:
Huh?
What are you guys
doing here?

Name: Relentless Specter
Message:
A living body!
Hehehe!
It’s so warm!

Hehehe!
This body’s mine!

Haha! This is such fun!
Shall we see who claims it?

I’m bored!
You!
Let’s play!

Well then!
Put up a fight!
This is fun, haha!

Oh, no! This is tricky!
Try harder!

Haha! This is fun!
Hehehe! Not funny!

The Undead
are insane,

but this one’s
especially nuts!

I’m tired!
Sick and tired
of waiting!

Now! Let’s fight!
Come on! Wahhh!

Raaaaar!
Priest of Einhasad!
They’ve come to kill us!

We must kill
them first!

Oh, no!
They don’t
like me!

The Seamstress will
be summoned soon.

It’s a success!
Let’s deal with her quickly!

Name: Seamstress
Message:
Eh? What’s this?
A servant of
Einhasad!

What? Defeat me?
Why won’t you die,
you slave?

Die, you
blasphemer!

Take a look around.
I feel a presence of
a strong specter.

Sorry, Elie...
I’m tired...

My preparations
are close to completion.
Not yet?

Name: East Gate Guard Balu
Message:
I think there’s some
money in it for me
if I capture you and
turn you in. Hehehe!

Name: East Gate Guard
Message:
Balu! Don’t forget
about what I did!

I’ll pay for everything today!
Hehehe!

Name: Botanist
Message:
There was even a Medusa
who was attached to
a statue it made...
Always be aware of your surroundings.

Name: Medusa Himena
Message:
How dare you touch my work?
You rude punks!

I’ll make sure you suffer!
I’ll turn you to stone,
then break you!

Stenoa will be angry!
Kazim, kill already!

Name: Deluded Kazim
Message:
No! Kazim obey!
Kazim kill!
Raaawr! Kazim kill you!

Dasparion, is that you?
You’re despicable!
I’ll take you with me!

A pointless struggle.
Continuing the summoning now
would mean

You’ll be trapped
600 more years...
Hahaha.

You’re vile! You
make Demons look good!

That Demon doesn’t
warrant any attention.
Deal with it quickly!

Alice! Where are you
going?

The Tax Officer
was incredibly
angry.

Ah... That miser...
What shall we do?
It’s one of the Tax
Officer’s henchmen.

Name: Giran Guard
Message: Hey! What’s this ruckus?

M-more guards!
We need to
get away!

Who’s there?!
Who killed you?
A spy from Oren?!

H-hurry!
The Gorgon Flower Garden
is this way!

Shhhk! Kill them!
Don’t let them interrupt
the ritual!

Name: Innadril Ambassador
Message:
I-is it the Silverlight Mercenaries?
Here! Over here!

Nice! Now!
Push all the way to the stake!

That tongue is
crazy-long! Russel!
Just run!

Giran is ours!
Shhhk! You think we’ll
lose the relic?!

Sorry, Russel!
The one with the really
long tongue was here!

Chancellor!
Just a minute!
Here we go!

Arzen, what research material
could you paw-sibly need
to retrieve out of
all this ruckus?

Name: Arzen
Message:
Us archaeologists
were studying
the history of Lesser Giants
in Cruma.

Our research showed that
the Lesser Giants
went into hiding
at the shore here.

But since our
research wasn’t finished,
we dispatched an
advance party.

We intended to wrap up
the research about
reviving the Lesser Giants
and then reconnecting with them...

Hey!
Try taking me, too!
Or will you kill me
like you did Anna?!

Ahh...
Calm down, Arzen!
Do you plan on killing us as well?!

Name: Ol Mahum Bandits Warrior
Message:
S-stop it!
Sniff sniff...
We took them to
the boss.

Kya!
I’ll see you again...
If you manage to survive!

Name: Ol Mahum Bandits Commander
Message:
Where are you going?!
You think I’ll let
you Humans escape?

Name: Anna
Message:
It’s the remaining baddies!
We need to guard the Teleportation Stone!

Name: Hugh
Message:
Isaac and I will
guard the Teleportation Stone!

The fire will
soon die out.
Let’s go quickly!

Meow...
If only I had a
Teleportation Stone...

Name: Ol Mahum Bandits Sentry
Message:
Ruff! Ruff!
Hold it there, you guys!

O-oh, no!
Run!

Name: Dismal Shout
Message:
Do you think
you’ll be safe?
Feel my anger!

Oh, my!
You can take
your rest, uncle!

Hahaha!
Well, Theodore,
I’ll let you to it.

I’m worried Elizabeth
will use Gnosis
as part of
a scheme.

Gnosis
is a Lesser Giant scholar
at the Cruma Tower,

so he has
extensive knowledge.
If that knowledge falls into the wrong hands,
we’re in trouble!

If there’s an
awakened Lesser Giant
here, we may
be too late!

Let’s hurry!
We need to stop her!

Name: Phobos
Message:
Useless giant!
Prepare to die!

We must stop her!
She’s planning
to kill Gnosis!

Darn it! Kill him!
We must save the Lesser Giant!

Name: Death Flyer
Message:
Did you think I’d
allow you to have
a nice rest?

Name: Ashear
Message:
Be careful!
The Undead are coming!

Name: Aiden
Message:
We have to stop
them from escaping
the Harbor!

Name: Zombie Pirate Navigator
Message:
Step aside
if you value your life!

We need to get out of here quick!
Everyone pay attention
and follow me!

The Dark Brotherhood
attacked us
a while back.

We doubled security
after that.

But this time was different.
One of the attackers made
a contract with a Demon.

The Demon’s power...
It really put us down!

We need to move quickly.
Everyone might have
already been defeated.

It seems meant to
take out anyone who
gets close!
Don’t let your guard down!

Name: Lesser Giant's Creation
Message: Raaawr!!!

Oh, my. They just
keep on coming!

Protect Feldheim
and the stone tablet!

Name: Vargal
Message:
You fools!
Bring that, too!

Yea, that one!
No, not that one!!!
Does this look expensive to you? Bring back something useful! It’s so hard to find good help these days...
Huh?!
Sniff sniff. Who are you guys?
Is this your wagon?

This is great, I wasn’t
getting anywhere, anyway.
Sniff sniff.
I’ll steal everything - even your skivvies!

Name: Ruben
Message:
First, defeat the
nearby Undead.

Leaving them alone
will make things
harder later.

Search the
northeast Harbor carefully!

First, we’ll
need to defeat
his minions.

Name: Wandering Dead
Message: Shriek!

Name: One-Eyed Alfonso
Message:
I can sense your
moist eyeball.

Can’t you give
it to me?

Make your choice.
Will you hand over your eyeball?

Otherwise,
I’ll just kill you!

Hehehe. Look, Captain!
They’re super scared.

What a bunch of cowards!
Hahahaha.

Quiet, you fool!
I’m talking!

But Captain,
I was merely...

Shut up!
This is why you guys
turn into zombies!

Ugh! This isn’t fun anymore!
Die, you!

I’ll leave you to focus on the
monsters to the northeast!

Nice to see you!
The boss will be happy!

Give me
your head!
Ahaha!

Defeat any
Undead you see!

Leaving them alone
will make things harder later.

Name: Cry of Despair
Message:
Arrgh!
The living!
I hate the living!

I refuse to suffer alone!
You must die, too!

Name: Holst
Message:
Ouch! Ouch!
It hurts!

This is your fault!
You deserve to suffer, too!
You deserve to suffer, too!

Your death will be slow...
Hehe...
I’ll make sure you suffer...

I’ll make sure you suffer!
You will suffer!

I’ll leave you to focus on the
monsters to the northwest!

Nice!
Now let’s use
the spell stone
to break the seal!

Name: Creation of the Lesser Giant
Message:
No!
Stop right there!

Huh?
Oh, it can still talk!

I won’t allow you
to come any closer!

Name: Anggras
Message:
Grrr...
Kill...

The Lesser Giant
seems unusual, doesn’t it?
Will kill!

Hey, Lesser Giant!
Don’t take
your anger out
on me!

Don’t forget to
