collect the core.

Name: Degenerated Lesser Giant
Message: Raaaaaaaa...

He’s still
a strong guy, even
if he’s regressed!

You...
attacked us...
We will also attack.

Name: Gnall
Message:
Stop these
barbaric actions!

Oh! Someone
who can talk properly
has appeared!

Do you think I endured
life in exile,

only to be hunted
by you fools?

You rude, arrogant
bunch of louts!

Haha! The has-been is upset.
Don’t worry about it.
I just need to get the money!

Now the
Undead don’t
scare me anymore!

I’m not
sure what the
Demon is doing here, but

I hope
this isn’t
the beginning...

We need to find
and defeat the leader!

Some poor soul
is lost.

Hahaha.
Well, we should
eat some grub
before Aktomus comes!

Name: Aktomus
Message:
Sigh!
What is this about?

Are you losing to
a mere adventurer?

I... don’t have anything to say.
He’s really strong...

Always give it your all!
Everyone, attack!

Name: George
Message:
I also handed over
the sacred incense burner.

According to the priests,
the dead will crowd together

when you
light the incense.

Then, you can deal with
them all at once.

Well, I...
I wouldn’t even
try that, but...

I think you stand
a chance.
Don’t let your guard down.

Do you really
intend on using the incense?
Argh!!!

Be careful!
They’ll rush in all at once!

I feel hatred
filling my empty heart!
I’ll destroy that incense!

The incense is
burning even stronger!

This incense!
It’s terrible!
Argh!

It’s most likely...
Einhasad’s
incense.

The Undead abhor
Einhasad.

They even
fear her.

Get rid of that
this instant! Now!

I’ve already been a part of
the Aden Explorers for three years...

I often think about
why I’m doing
this sort of thing.

If it wasn’t for Dorothy,
I would’ve given this up a long time ago...

Ugh...
That
fool
Mitchell!

It’s a miracle
that we’re
still alive!

Mitchell seems to
have really good
luck for some reason.
Especially for someone so untalented!

Oh! I need
a few claws in addition
to the teeth!

Fresh meat will
definitely attract
them!

Whoa! Feeding frenzy!
They’re all
crowding
around!

I’m not particularly worried.
Defeat them quickly and come.

They’re located
a short distance
from here.

Come back safely.
Hehe.

Don’t forget
to catch
their leader!

Name: Bandits Pillager
Message:
Huh?
What do you want?
Why are you looking for our boss?

Sniff sniff!
Come play with me,
child. Hehehe!

Name: Nagash
Message:
Huh?
What’s up with that kid?

Did that kid
really rob you?

Yes! You fools!
Boss!
What should we do?

You fool!
We plunder!
Rob them all!

Got it, boss!
Sniff sniff!

Don’t focus too much.
Leave at the right time.

Over there!
We looked for you for a long time!

We can’t just let you leave!
Here we go!

Have you ever heard
Dorothy and
Sara Ra
nagging simultaneously?

They’d even wear
through dragon scales,
to give you an idea...

Ugh.
I can already
hear them, and
it’s making me sick!

Isn’t that my bag
over there?

Name: Bandits Supplier
Message:
What’s going on?!
Get ‘em!

They’re the one
who’s been going around
picking fights!

Name: Greedy Gudd
Message:
Hey!
Their equipment
looks nice!

It’s nicer than Grade A!
Jackpot!
Hahahaha!

Captain!
They’re pretty strong!

It’s all about equipment, isn’t it?
Can’t you tell by looking?
Take everything!

Captain!
How can we win against
better equipment?!

Quiet!
Do as you’re told!

W-we need to find provisions!
If Dorothy finds out...
Ugh!

Hurry up!
Quickly now!

If you come up short,
then steal from
Ol Mahum!

Name: Bandits Commander
Message:
This is mine!
You thief!

Only a fool steals
from bandits!

You must
be insane!

Name: Nabas
Message:
You can’t even deal
with one person,
and you call yourselves officers?

Men,
assemble!

Die!
No-good pickpocket!
Don’t you know this
is my territory?

Name: Bandit Leader's Left Hand
Message:
Here are the rats!
Fools!
Get over here quickly!

Meow!
It’s Lyle’s left-hand man!

Lyle nor his right hand
man is here so
I’m the boss!
Bring me their heads!

Just a little further
and we’ll reach the town!
We need to make it there!
Hey, Theodore, here’s a gift.
I hope you have a good time with Gnosis since you’re such a fan.
Well, I’ll see you next time!
N-no! Elizabeth!!!

Name: Frederick
Message:
It’s a trap!
There are Primas
pouring out!

D-don’t touch it...
I-it’s mine...

W-what’s the deal
with these guys?!
What’s wrong with them?

Do you know
anything about
Zaken?

Zaken is a pirate king
who was infamous
throughout Aden.

But one
day he
mysteriously
vanished.

A while later,
Undead pirates
started appearing
in Giran Harbor.

They proclaimed themselves
the Zaken Pirates.
See what I’m getting at?

B-Barrett!
What do you
think you’re doing?!

Name: Barrett
Message:
D-die!
No one can
have it! It’s mine!

Oh no, are we too late?
Be careful!
They’re dangerous!

Name: Zaken Pirates Cutthroat
Message:
Hehehe!
More stupid souls
got caught in
my trap!

Oh, no! They’ve come
for our souls!

Huh? What do you
mean there’s another one?
YOU!!!

Y-you monster!
What are you doing
to my minions?!

Name: Soul Collector
Message:
Your minions?
Thanks for providing
such worthy sacrifices.
Hehehehe...

They will make a
suitable meal for our captain.
I suggest you say goodbye...

N-no!
Wait!
Frederick, wait!
I’ll take your souls as well!
He’ll be happy.
This is my area!
You’ll never escape!

This shipwreck...
Is this Zaken’s pirate ship?
Hmm... Something’s odd.
Why is Zaken’s pirate ship scuttled?
Hmm... Seems you were right about the contents of the diary.
Whoa! Ambush!

Name: Killer
Message:
It’ll be my pleasure
to take your souls!

Was this you?!
Did you do this?!

This is for the soldiers!
No one leaves
here alive!
Arghh!!!
Over here! Here!

Name: Nix
Message:
Hand over
that crystal!

We’re here!
Attack!

Are you the one who
wrecked our advance party?

N-no!
Leave us alone,
you Demons!

Grab a hold of yourself,
Ashear!
It’s me, Frederick!

It’s a lost cause!
We have no choice
but to defeat him!

Name: Osto
Message:
Go, Caliban!
Trample those fresh souls!

We can’t let Caliban
have all the fun.

Time for me
to join in!

Come at me,
you zombies!
You’ll never get
my body or soul!

Captain Frederick!
Don’t overexert yourself!
You might reopen
your wounds!

Hold it there,
you witch!!!

Frederick, wait!
It has to be a trap!

The pirates are coming!
Be careful!

This is vengeance
for killing my minions!!!
Die!

It’s us!
Get a hold of yourself, Frederick!

It’s a lost cause!
We need to defeat him!

Name: Zaken
Message:
Ah... Yes...
It’s you.
The ones who killed the collector

and messed
with my crew...
What tempting
souls you have.

Brave souls like
yourselves deserve
special treatment.

I’ll make sure you’re
still alive to feel it
when I take your souls.

You’ve been busy
if you found
the relic!

You’ll die in agony
long before you
seal my power!

We must weaken
him first if we are to
seal his phantom!

Leave the fighting to us
and focus on sealing him!
Theodore!

There! On the bridge!
The pirates
are coming!

Darn it!
Brace yourselves!

Name: Sara
Message: Be careful! Zaken’s crew is after the treasure!

Name: Zaken's Minion
Message: Hehehe. All the treasure here belongs to Zaken.
How dare you touch Zaken’s treasure!
You’ll pay with your death!
Phew! That was a close one! Good work!
Next up is over there.
I found a Blue Treasure Chest during my adventure!
The Blue Treasure Chest should be in the gold pile to the north.
Careful! This box is probably booby-trapped.
Oh, no! It’s a gigantic Scorpion!
Watch out for the poison!
Nice! There’s only one left!
The dark box should be to the east!
Argh! Be careful!!! The monsters are coming!

Oh no... It’s Nassa!
Were we too greedy?
We can’t run from that guy!
We have to fight for our lives!
W-who are you?! Have you come to rescue us?
There - pirates!
Ahahahaha!!!
There’s no escape.
Soon, Zaken will return!
He’ll come for your souls!

Name: Commander
Message: Watch out for the Navigators!
Hurry up and defeat him!
The box should be inside.
Hurry!

Name: Pirate Crew
Message: Don’t open that box!
You can’t take the skeleton!
Defeat the Cutthroat!
Find the shrunken monster!
Whoa! Save me! Side effects? Nonsense!
I-I thought it was supposed to have side effects, but nothing this extreme!
The relic’s power is incredible. Defeat them!
If I recall correctly, Shamong's Grave is...
It should be by the bridge to the Gold Cave!
The trip to the grave won’t be easy.
Defeat the Premo on the way!
If you don’t defeat the Premo, I won’t get paid!
That’s enough!
The necklace should be in the grave! Take it quickly!

Name: Succubus
Message: Oh, myyyyyy... Are you touching our treasure without permission?
Many people have come looking for it.
Are you after it as well?
Hahaha. What’s that face for? Let’s dance!
Any more temptation and you might end up buried, too, you know?

It doesn’t seem to be
here. Go over there.
The Prima are blocking our view.
These pests have been bugging me - get rid of them!

Name: Navigator Railey
Message:
You guys sure are
noisy! And that thing
up front is the
noisiest of all!

W-What?!
Is that conch shell
talking to me?

C-conch shell? I’ll
make you regret
your insolence!
Attack!

I’ll leave that side to you!
Time to clean some seafood!
I’ve cut limbs off plenty of your ilk!
You will face the same fate!
Damn it! I was trying to make things less dangerous, and instead, I made things worse!
This conch shell sure is irritating!
I’ll destroy the whole lot of you! Bring it on!

You should be fine on your own, right?
There must be something more here! I’m sure of it!
Why are you complaining when you’re doing well? Hold on a little longer - this is important!

Yes! I found it!
Are you still not done?

Name: Rena
Message: What are you cute babies doing in a place like this?
I’ll charm you!
I’m a girl, you know?

W-what? Uh...
I didn’t do something wrong, right?

Name: Noel
Message:
D-don’t... touch...
It’s... mine...

Wahh...
They... They’re coming again!
They look like the Giran advance party. What’s going on?
Y-you’re not giving me much choice!

G-go back...
I-it’s... mine...
K-kill...

Barrett, get a hold of yourself!
Okay?

S-stay back! Don’t touch me!
I-I’ll kill everyone!

Name: Kirion
Message:
This stench
is unbearable!
Who is it?!

What an incredible guy!
Watch out for his axe!

A Human on Devil's Isle!
It’s been a while since I’ve felt the urge to kill!
I’ll rend you limb from limb!

Ugh...
Incredible power...

Hmm? A book?
Bring it to me quickly.

Be careful!
Ambush!
You lot! Where did you come from?

Are you crazy?!
Why do I have to hand it over?

Haha. You get excited so quickly!
If you won’t hand over the crystal, I’ll take it by force.

Darn it... Did you
mind control the advance party?

Hahaha!
I’ll take my time to enjoy this!
Ugh... You wicked...!

Oh! Soldiers aren’t everything.
Hahahaha!

E-even the adventurers?!
You! I can’t forgive you!

You’re tougher than I expected!
I’ll deal with you myself!
Arghh!!!

Captain Frederick!
Theodore!
What took you so long?!

Focus, Aymel!
He’s not an easy opponent!

Name: Executor
Message:
Yes... Okay.
I command you in the name of darkness!
Awaken, demon!!!

Name: Awakened Ancient Demon
Message: Arghhh!
Ugh...! How dare you use Ashear as a sacrifice to call forth that Demon?! You vile filth!

Everyone be careful!
He’s not an easy opponent!
Deal with Zaken’s Slaves right meow!
If they’re allowed to run wild, the sailors will be in danger! Hiss!
T-that!!!
Make sure to bring me the Slaves’ swords, meow!
Let’s make a purr-rofit!

Name: Hermes
Message: Hand it over meow!
Meow!!!
H-help! Hiss!!!
All the gold here is mine!
Get your paws off it!
Even if you save me, the gold’s all mine, meow!
Nero found it, meow?

Name: Kenbell
Message: How dare you go after my treasure?
You must be out of your mind!
This treasure is mine! I licked it!
I can’t just abandon such a valuable treasure, hiss!
My name is Hermes, meow!
I don’t care what your name is - just die!!!
Defeat the Premo and find the supplies, meow!
He must’ve stashed them somewhere, meow!
It’s here! Mrow! Found it!
Quick! Look through the supplies meow!
Hiss!!!! The Premos!
T-they’re coming, meow!
P-protect me! Hiss!!!
I’ll pay you if we survive! Mrow!!!

Name: Lemon
Message: You dare try to take what is mine? You must have a death wish!
Foolish Premos! You can’t guard one object?!
You will pay for your greed with your life!
Nesca disappeared over by all the Demons!
Defeat the Succubi and Primas, meow!
Purr-haps they’re hiding a clue!
It’s Nesca! Mrow!
Thank goodness, meow! We have found Nesca!
Woah! There come the Cat Merchants, meow!!!
They are the Cat Merchants who accompanied Nesca!
They all seem insane, meow! Can no one recognize me?!

Name: Nesca
Message: Hehehehe. All the treasures here are mine, ruff!
Don’t you dare touch them! Ruff! They are all mine!
Try to take what is mine and die!!! Ruff!
Get rid of Zaken’s minions!
If you chase them, you’ll find their stash of gold!
There! Find the red gold in the pile of treasure!
Watch out for Zaken’s minions’ attacks!
If you’re critically injured while holding the gold, kiss your soul goodbye!
Oh, no. They’re coming! Be careful!!!

Name: Karell
Message: Looks like we’re adding another soul to the pile!
First, defeat Zaken’s minions.
They’ve always targeted us!
Argh! Damn skeletons!
Found it! Over there! Pull the relic out of the pile of gold!
Be careful! It’s valuable stuff!
Mana! I feel the relic’s mana!
Zaken! Zaken wants it!

Name: Vic
Message: Unhand the relic!
You will pay for your actions!
The way will be dangerous.
Defeat any Lookouts and Cutthroats you encounter on the way.

Name: Cous
Message: Here! Over here!
Did Sara send you?
There’s no time! Protect me from the monsters!
Augh! Zaken’s minions!
H-help!!!
Hehe. Well done.
At last, the treasure is all ours!
Now, prepare to die.
Men, kill him!

Name: Ditch
Message: It’s good practice to defeat any enemies you meet along the way.
They aren’t picky about when they attack.
Seems you’ve dealt with most of the situation. Now, bring me the object!

Name: Caruso
Message: How dare you try to touch his stuff?!
Your death will be unavoidable!
I’ll deal with this myself! Consider it an honor!

Name: Tark
Message: First, defeat the Boatswain and Helmsman ahead of you!
Avenge the soldiers they killed!

Name: Advance Party Soldier
Message:
Die, you all!!!
Hyaaa!
Tark should be safe, right?

Name: Janna
Message:
You thought you would be fine after messing with us pirates?
Die, you fools!!!
If you’re attacked while holding the gold, your soul will be stolen!

H-help!!!
I-I’m going to run away!
Kya! Kya!
Human! Kill!!!

How odd.
It’s about time Oren’s Peace Envoy arrived.

Oh, my. Is this Orc territory?
I need to meet up with the Peace Envoy quickly.

This is proof of the battle between the Humans and Orcs.
Could it be...

We’ll go inside, but keep an eye out for Orc Sentries.
Follow me.
Look carefully. There might be clues.

There’s a cage over there.
There may
be survivors!!!
Quick! Go check!

Name: Jen
Message: Augh! Orcs! The Orcs are back!

Well, this has gotten complicated.
We must defeat the Orcs while protecting the Peace Envoy.

The Dark Elf
Wizard seems
to have gone somewhere.

I’m a diplomat,
not a soldier.
Don’t expect much
from me.

Ha! Those Orcs!
They got what they deserved!
Have a taste of that!

Name: Cara
Message:
I couldn’t tell
from far away.

But up close,
you’re really cute!
Hehe.
Your fur is so fluffy!

No! Paws off!
Every touch is
10 million Adena!
Mrow!!!

It’s a success!
The Primas are
congregating nearby!

There’s so many of them.
Maybe their
leader will appear!

How could this be?
It’s Gore!
How many souls did it consume?!

Name: Soul Collector Gore
Message: Did you really think I’d fall for a trick like that?
Your souls look even sweeter!
Hurry! Hand them over!!!
You souls will live forever inside me!!!
Quick! Come here!
How about you guys stay here since it’s dangerous?

Name: Arthur
Message: Mrow! Are you telling us to stay by ourselves... in the middle of the Orc town?!

You guys are our only hope meow.
Please don’t throw our lives away!
All the Orc Warchiefs are gathered together.
An Orc group of that size is truly daunting.

Hold on!
You barbarians!
Jen, wait!

Name: Breka High Warchief
Message:
Hahaha!
I thought you guys
would flock like fireflies
once the ambassador was endangered!

Ugh!
M-my leg!

Hahaha!
What’s this?
You can’t even
stand straight!!!

Oh! We’re late!
We need to join them!

What’s with this guy?
Pulverize ‘em!

The signal fire’s lit!
You’ll make a
great sacrifice!

Wait, Cara!
Damn it, there’s no time!

Activate the Teleportation Stone!
Cara won’t be able to
hold out for long!

Name: Celin
Message:
Cara, how could you bring outsiders here?
Don’t you have any pride as an Elf?
Stop! They are our guests, Celin.

Name: Rowen
Message: Cara should have told you about the Protection Tree.
In the past, this land was home to a verdant forest.
Then, one day, Dragons appeared and set the entire forest on fire.
Only the Protection Tree and its immediate surroundings survived.
We succeeded in driving off the Dragons.
There were some who rejoiced in the victory, but the town was uninhabitable.
Our homeland was dead, and the Protection Tree, the source of its power,
slowly faded.

At that moment,
the tree was beset
by villains.

And an Undead wizard, called
the Blood King, stole
its the essence.

We sent out pursuers,
but no one
came back alive.
Refund 10% of your lost pro-purr-ty? What do you mean by that?

I’m going meow.
See you next time!
I found a strange stone tablet while excavating.
Ever since then, it’s felt as though the monsters have been attacking less frequently.
There seems to be something special about this stone tablet!

Oh! I found something
intriguing recently.
Do you know about
the Blood King?

The Blood King...
The enemy of tree...!

I heard he was
an incredible Undead wizard
back in the day.

I heard he grew too greedy
in his quest for Mana
and lost his life.
Don’t add too much salt to the fried egg.

Name: Dragon Knight Quesnel
Message:
Are you still alive?
You sure are stubborn.

I’m sure you’ll die at the hands of Cager
and Veremus, even if you pass through here.

I will not allow
you to travel any
further into the valley.

I’ll end your
lives here!

Name: Veremus
Message: I was wondering who was digging around... seems I’ve caught a few flies.
You’re fearless - but you’ll pay for barging into my nest.

The Blood King?
As if you have enough clout to question me.
I’ll take care of Cara and take her to the Elder.

Name: Blood King
Message:
Ah... So there were
still descendants of the
Protection Tree?

Truly incredible...
But I’ll have you know that I absorbed your essences.

Fighting you wouldn’t
be any fun,
would it?

But... Oh! I know!
I’ll make you fight each other!!!

Fight, descendants of the
Protection Tree!

Name: Fallen Celin
Message: Ugh!!! Ahhh!
My head!!! My head!!!

The Blood King
is trying to
control me!

If I lose control of myself,
don’t hesitate!
Kill me!

I don’t want
to be a burden!

Not bad!
But this too
shall end soon!
Mrow! I’m so glad to see the Elves alive again! (Sniff sniff.)
I’m not crying! Where did all these onions come from?
Argghh!!! Help!
Hahaha... How dare you try to find the spellbook!
Tsk. A heckler. Get rid of him!

Name: Borgos
Message: Who do you think you are? Kill them all!
There’s the spellbook! Grab whatever and run!
They’re coming after us! Hurry up!

Name: Nithos
Message: Arrghhh! Help!!!
The monsters are aiming for me!
Isn’t this my sword?! Thank you!

Make mincemeat
of them!

Hey, Ambassador!
Prepare to watch
your rescuers die!

Name: Caranese
Message:
Ugh... Be careful!
Jen! You mustn’t die!
Who’s there?

I knew I smelled
some putrid pointy ears
around here...

Dragon Knight Quesnel...!
Ugh...

Step back!
Niah!

That stone tablet...
Hehehe. You’ve been
hard at work.

Bring the stone tablets with you.
Capture the Elf alive
and kill the rest.

Eeek...!
You can’t take the stone tablet!

Feldheim!
Protect Niah!

Niah!
This isn’t what’s
important! Be careful!

Mrowwwww!!!
It’s the Grandis!!!
Help!!!

Name: Mahmmon the Boss’s Brother
Message:
How dare you kill my little brother?!
I’ll kill you!
Mahmmon will kill you!

Darn it!
They’re onto us!
Be careful!

Mrow? Destroy it?
That’s such a waste.
A little cat burglary couldn’t hurt, right?

Mr. Cat!
You’ll get sick
if you eat those!

Name: Hammon
Message:
Oh, no!
Cager’s minions
are following us!
Prepare for battle!

Be careful!
It’s Cager!

Name: Dragon Knight Cager
Message:
Arrggghh!
What are you doing
to my Wyrms?!

Hiss! It’s Cager!
Hand over the
expensive Elven sword meow!

Pan!
This isn’t the time to be playing around!

If you want it that badly,
I’ll hand it over!

Huh?!
Surprisingly enough, that worked!

That is, I’ll hand it over
right into your throats!
Watch out!

That Elven sword
looks expensive!

What...
Don’t even think about it!

Name: Chef Kachoi
Message:
Ah! So the ruckus
in the kitchen was
all because of a rat.

Looks like
meat’s back
on the menu,
boys!
Hahahahaha!!!

It’s done!
We’ll stand watch,
so you can untie
the Cardinal!

There should still
be Primas around.

Ugh... They’re so persistent!
Get out of my hometown!

Do you remember
where we buried
that Sahara's Heart
earlier?

You just need to
head that way.
I’ll go ahead and meet you there.

Name: Grandis Leader
Message: This is our land!
Get off our land!!!
Die, outsider!!!
I’ll grind your bones to dust!
Be careful of his weapon!

Name: John
Message: Come out guys!

Name: John’s Bandits
Message:
Hehehe.
He’ll surely fetch
a price!

Take everything
they have!

Name: Female Windsus
Message: Squeal!!!

Oink!
Squeal!

Name: Male Windsus
Message: Oink! Oink!
Oink! Oink! Oink!

Meow!
Grendel is coming!
Protect us!

What is that monstrosity?
I didn’t know a
Grendel could get so big!

Coocoo!
Dig faster meow!!!
T-truffle!!!

Argh!
Save me meow!!!

Coocoo!
Protect Coocoo!
Grendel is after
Coocoo!

Name: Poricule
Message: Get him!!!

Paralyze with poison
and bind him with spider webs!

Intruder!
Catch him too!!!

Tsk!
If only there wasn’t a heckler!
I’ll get you next time!

Name: Pedicule
Message:
You dare touch
my eggs?!
I’ll make you regret
trespassing in my web!

Poricule will deal
with you, even
if I’m no longer around!

Where are you
kids going?

You will
nourish
my spawn!

My spawn will grow strong off your bodies.
Your deaths will be peaceful.

Argh!!!
The Atroxes
are coming at us!!!

Meow!!!
W-we need to get out!

Name: Ravine Hunter
Message: Argh!

Run!!!
We’re no match for them!

Run!!!
We need to run away!!!

Name: Town Chief Ariana
Message:
Stop them!!!
We need to guard the assembly hall!
There are women
and children there!

I’ll leave you to deal with
the fire in the south barracks!

To the west!
The fire is spreading quickly!

The fire has spread
to the storehouse!
Hurry!!!

We must stop them from
entering the Campsite!

We must stop
them at the bridge!

I-I’m scared!
Help me out!

Name: Underboss Hadok
Message:
You dumb pigs!
The queen said to
bring back the skeleton!

Now! Bring back the skeleton!
Dispose of that
weak human!

Name: Troop Captain Maxim
Message:
You fools dare to
raid my lair?
I’ll destroy you!!!

I’ll destroy
you all!!!

Come out quickly
or you’ll be surrounded!

Maxim is notorious
for sadism.

You seem to be having a hard time!
Good thing I’m here to help!

No human
poses a threat to me!
Die!!!

Phew.
That was tougher than I expected!

This place is dangerous.
Let’s get out
of here.

Name: Bugbear Devourer
Message:
Sniff, sniff.
Meat...?
I smell meat!

Name: A Hungry Bugbear
Message:
You traitor!
Are you hoarding that all for yourself?

I want some!
I want to eat, too!!!
Share that meat with me!

There are humans here!
Let’s eat them, too!

Name: Queen Piladesia
Message:
How dare you
filth trespass here?

Men!
Get rid of them!

I’ll water the flowers
with your blood!

Name: Emoleta
Message:
Bug off, you slug!!!
The skeleton of the ancient
demon Musica is mine!

I’ll drag you
all to hell with me!

Name: Steiner
Message:
I set off to find
the Lord of Oren’s missing wife
who disappeared around here.

Unfortunately, the swarm of Bugbears
is making my
search difficult.

She went missing
after her husband’s
concubine arrived.

These Steel Bars
won’t break from such stones.

It seems someone was digging
here but gave up half-way.

Name: Chief Guard Shakman
Message:
Well, well.
How daring of you to attempt
a jailbreak under my watch.

You must be out of your mind!
You’ll all hang for this!

Name: Kate
Message:
Hurry!
This way!

Well, well!
The Silverlight Mercenaries
are a bunch of small fries!

Varto, Tory,
give them a beating!

Russel!
We wouldn’t have
struggled underground if you
hadn’t gotten us lost!

Haha! My mistake!
What matters is that
we’re all here now, right?

Let’s get some
Orenese armor first!

Name: Raihel
Message:
You guys
abducted Salein!

Go to hell!
That’s the only
place you belong!

I’ll make sure to finish
you guys off myself!

Raihel,
stop!

Steiner, you traitor!
I trusted you!

Stop!
This is all a misunderstanding!

I have no time for
a traitor’s lies.

They are innocent!
Please spare their lives!

Let’s go to
the weapon shop!

Okay!
Hurry over here!

I want to deal
with them now but
we must find out
what they are headed.

The first lady
might be in great danger
if we aren’t careful.

Did nothing
happen in the cage?

Russel said you
encountered some Lizardmen?

I wonder if
Leto Lizardmen from
west of the town
are involved...

Name: Creezaro
Message:
You’ll make a
worthy sacrifice!
Kill them!

Careful!
The Lizardmen are coming!

I finally found you!
I’ve been looking all over the place!

Name: Aisa
Message:
Seems you had some trouble
despite how confident you were. Hehe.

Name: Crogurk
Message:
Kill!
Grunky will surely be pleased!
Dumb lizards!

Showing your face here
is proof of your stupidity!
Well, let’s get started!
Aisa, I’ll leave it to you!

Careful!
The Lizardmen
are coming!

Name: Grunky
Message:
What are you trying
to do to the Crystal?!!
Arghh!!!

You lizards!
What the heck are
you up to?

Kekeke.
You Humans are
so foolish...
What’s so funny?

Don’t you understand
that you’ve played
right into our
hands?

Name: Crokyle
Message:
My babies!!!
How dare you kill them!

You there!
Send out the call!
Burn all the Humans!
Sacrifice them all!

My children!
I will avenge you!

Leave the
people alone!

I’ll make sure you
share this pain!

Just the thought of your
suffering gives me joy!
Hahahahaha!

Salein!!!
Salein is over there!
I’ll trust you to deal with the shamans!

Hurry!
The shamans have
begun their ritual!
We must hurry for Salein’s sake!

N-NO!!!
It ate Salein...

Name: High Shaman Shras
Message:
Their blood will
enhance our intelligence.

We must not give up!
Salein was swallowed whole,
so she might still be alive!

You lot honestly
think you stand a chance
against me? Die!!!

You’ve ruined everything,
you wretched
Silverlight Mercenary!

I’ll make sure to
kill you slowly!

Name: Foreman Bakum
Message:
Aha! You’re in
cahoots with Caraku!

Kazan, the new chief,
will be unbeatable no matter
what you do!
This will be your grave!

Name: Chief Guard Croatica
Message:
Intruder!
Find the intruder!

How foolish.
They would still be alive
if they’d stayed still!

Kill
them all!

Not too shabby!
But now - you will know
Kazan’s strength!
We’re here!

Name: Rakum
Message:
Croatica!
Die, you traitor!

Name: Chief Kazan
Message:
I saved you because
you were the chief. And this
is how you repay me?

You will pay for your
mistake with your life.

You guys are
nothing as long as
I have this.

You should’ve been thankful
that I made you humans!
Kill them all!

Name: Enhanced Kazan
Message:
This is so much more
fun than I expected!!!
But playtime stops now.
Time for you to die!

H-he’s...
He’s huge!

Do you recall the
agreement with the Tanor Chief
on the Summit of Dissonance?

We formed an alliance
with the Tanor in order to
help their unification efforts.

However, the Tanor here
are cousins of
Kankoon, the Tribal Chief.

The local chief heard
about Kankoon and has taken Durzel,
who was here as a diplomat, hostage.
He is currently making threats.

There’s no time.
Let’s hurry!

Name: Tribal Chief Hamgalalte
Message:
Durzel?
You mean... that Human?
Why would I tell you anything?

We’re not
here to fight!

I’ve heard countless tales
of your wicked ways!

Did you think
I didn’t know
you stole the relic?

What are you talking about?
We asked you about Durzel.
There will be no negotiation!

Calm down.
Sheesh. They sure are
difficult to talk to...
You leave me with no choice.

Hey, look!
It’s the Dark Brotherhood!

Silverlight Mercenaries?
Are you here
looking for her, too?

Her?
Who are you talking about?

Anyway, this is fantastic.
Elizabeth will definitely be pleased!

When we capture you,
Elizabeth will see
how loyal we are!

You goons
dare stand in our way?

Bah!
We’ll finish this
next time!!!

Over here!
Help!!!

Name: Molly
Message:
Hurry!
We need to get out of here!

I can feel my
pursuers’ presence!

We’ll hold them off!
Everyone else,
take care of the kid!

Okay!
Leave it to us!

Go!
Take the kid
somewhere safe!

Name: Embrion
Message: Bug off!

That!!!
Steal that!!!
Steal it!!!
Let’s deal with the minions first!
These guys don’t have much fight in them!
There! The Chief’s Token! Let’s take that first!
Careful! They’ll charge in to take the Chief’s Token!
How dare a human touch the Chief’s Token!
We’ll show you the might of the Tanor Silenos!

Name: Honor Fighter Vartis
Message: Wait! Hold it! They’re holding the Chief’s Token.
They should join the fight.
Not that they’ll last long, heh!
Fight fair and square.

Name: High Shaman Varpio
Message: I’ll deal with you...
Have a taste of my magic!!!
Not too shabby, facing off against Varpio.
I’ll deal with you myself!
I won’t go down easy.

Name: Backup Chief Beto
Message: Ha! Weaklings.
I expected you to lose quickly!
Bring it on! I’ll take you on!
I see the Windsuses!!!
I’ll warm up the grill!!!
Looks like meat’s back on the menu!
That guy! Jeez! What’s his problem?
The stress is no joke!
Here we go!
Quick, grab more! We need more herbs!
There are a lot more quality herbs than expected!
Here we go!
Mmm... Smells good!
Hehe! This should be enough!
It’s unlikely, but let me know if you find it!
A Bugbear wearing an apron...?
Ha! Don’t be ridiculous.
I’ll start a fire while you deal with the Bugbears.
We must move swiftly and precisely!
Be careful! Nymphs are quite violent!
Over there.
Please collect their fangs!
Be careful of the venom!
You could be killed instantly if you don’t watch out!
I would collect them myself, but...
Oh! If only I hadn’t twisted my ankle! Darn.
Renner’ll definitely be surprised when he sees I defeated a fighter!
Be careful of their horns!
Hmm. So that’s how they fight!
I thought he’d be stronger!
Ahha!
Try persuading them!
He doesn’t seem like much of a talker.
Well, we don’t have much of a choice...
Now we need to defeat all of them...
Thank you! I’m a little busy dealing with everyone else.
These small fries sure are a hassle!
You must collect a Nymph’s tears when it dies!
Be quick when you defeat Nymphs!
Now! Do it now!
There! It’s him!
That menacing look!
(Startled!)
Take the egg quickly meow!
Be careful not to destroy the Bone Headgear!
There! The Bone Headgear fell!
Don’t forget anything!
Damn Orcs!
I’ll make sure we get our vengeance!
Those damn, dirty Orcs!
I’ll defeat as many as I can!
Hyaa!
Defeat the Elite Soldier!
I’m certain we’ll find keepsake!
About ten should please the bereaved.
Be careful!!!
I’ll dock your pay if the leather is damaged!
Be careful not to get any blood on it, either!
Try not to damage the horn!
Any damage done to it translates to mana lost!

Name: Tyron
Message: I haven’t been able to contact the Ivory Tower Wizards since they made this request.
I wonder if something happened at the Ivory Tower...
Regardless, we can’t ignore their request.
That should be plenty! Quick. Set it on fire!
He might show up if we’re lucky!
The monsters are here! Deal with them quickly!
They sure are some tough cookies!

Name: Angsra
Message: Hmm! What is this?
You arrogant hoodlum!
How dare you burn my seal?
The price of your ignorance will be death!

Name: Lady Nine
Message: There’s almost no chance to enter the interior of the Sea of Spores.
The prices of the objects found only here...
You get the picture without me having to spell it out, right?
This is your chance to get things even the Cat Caravan can’t get their hands on!
There are two types of Obsidian Golems.
The one I found is older and more powerful!
Wait! I think I’ve found signs of an ancient Obsidian Golem.

Name: Ancient Obsidian Golem
Message: Fool! How dare you wake me from my slumber?
Yikes! I guess it wasn’t dead?

Name: Jaka
Message: You greedy fools never change...
Your kind should be extinct by now!
You’ll meet the same end as the others!
This way! I could hear you fighting from all the way over there!
Hah! Material that finds itself - this is great!
I’ll pay you less if I have to get involved.
You wouldn’t want that to happen, right?

Name: Tarugal
Message: Roar!!! Who hit my servant?
Hey, you! Get over here! I’ll rough you up to ease my boredom!
That guy’s massive!
Hey! Aren’t you going to run?
Don’t push yourself too hard! What’s the point if you die?
Did you find anything useful?

Name: Oel Mahum Supplier
Message: There! Over there!
We’ll catch you! You damn thief!
Meow! This is nice meow! They must have chased us for a reason!
This must be something useful!

Name: Hammertooth
Message: Roar!
Meow! My eardrums! Why so loud?!
Merchants? And small fries? Are you kidding me?!
Kill all noisy Oel Mahums!
Muahaha! Your hides’ll make some nice slippers!
A merchant only partakes in profitable deals!
You’re just as loud as you are large! Why don’t you be a damn slipper!

Name: Jayhan
Message: I can’t even remember how long I’ve been like this for!
It’s a miracle that I’ve kept my sanity.
It’s because I’m such a great dark mystic.
Anyone else would’ve gone mad!
Oh! I fell asleep! Hmm? Be careful! An enemy!

Name: Oel Mahum Shaman
Message: Who dares touch the Crystal of Activation!
Hurry up! We need to deal with this before Jenis finds out!
Huh? Did they say Jenis?

Name: Jenis
Message: That dumb Jayhan really doesn’t know when to quit.
Jenis? Is that Jenis?
Yea dummy! You’ve been chased out. Don’t you get it?
What did you say? What? Why? Why do I have to do that?
I have no obligation to answer you. Hehehe...
You will experience a wonderful and eternal life... Hehehe...
This is ridiculous! I’m innocent! Don’t do this!
They helped that dummy Jayhan. Those dumb Silverlight Mercenaries...

Name: Votang
Message: I trust you will know what to do as you are experienced with this matter.
Over there - that looks like the bag that was stolen from me.

Name: Oel Mahum Petty Thief
Message: Hmm? Hey! What are you doing?
A thief? Or an idiot? Maybe both?
Hey, that’s mine! You damn thieves!
Hehehe! Catch me if you can!

Name: Kuzran
Message: What’s this ruckus about?
Huh? He’s the one who ambushed me!
Oh - that merchant sent you? I knew I should’ve finished him off!
Repaying my mercy like this? Tsk. So ungrateful!
Return my wife’s keepsake!
No way! Finders Keepers!
Now, you and your minion will die!
Do you know about Nymphs?
They are known for their beauty... but I have yet to see one.
The object we are after will be the base material for a very expensive perfume.
This way meow! Bring it quickly meow!
Woah! Look over there! She looks beautiful... but dangerous!

Name: Mary Rose
Message: Those guys dare attack us?
We can’t give up the loot! That’s a huge payday!
You dirty merchant! I’ll finish you off!

Name: Hallamari
Message: Why are you bothering my sisters and me...?
I can no longer remain silent about your evil deeds.
Uh oh! This is dangerous!
We need to beat them meow! We can’t give up on new items!
You’re no better than a parasite as long as you’re helping those misers!

Name: Hanshen
Message: This town used to be embroiled in turmoil.
Fortunately, the townsfolk were able to make it through those tough times.
But I’m seriously worried this time.
Defeating the minions isn’t going to do anything. We need to find the leader!

Name: Pan Luem
Message: Kekeke! Prey!!!
Be careful! They’re very aggressive!
Mine! Mine! I’m going to kill them!

Name: Waika
Message: Wow, not bad. My minions might be dumb, but they’re not weak!
You will pay the price for killing my minions.
Hang in there! Hahaha!
This species is only found in the Sea of Spores.
It has great academic value.
Huh? I think that bag on the floor is mine.

Name: Spore Fungus
Message: I knew you’d come back for your bag! You wicked creature!
Huh? What’s going on?
They’re the murderers! Get them!

Name: Fungurian
Message: Roar!!!
Don’t listen to the monsters!
That big guy sure is unique!
I think he’ll be a good sample, don’t you?

Name: Claire
Message: The bailiff is different from most aristocrats.
He enjoys fighting on the battlefield.
Even so, we need to deal with this - we don’t have much time.
There is no telling when entry to this place will be restricted.
Be careful with that jar. It’s bad news if it breaks.
Huh? There’s something about this Seal Jar!

Name: Unbound Reaper
Message: It’s the outside world!!! How dare you seal us up!!!
Wait! Your soul looks delicious!
Perfect timing! I was just in the mood for a snack!
What?! There’s a monster coming out of the jar!
Oh, no! The jar cracked! Please defeat the monster!

Name: Osner
Message: Woohoo! Fresh air! Farewell, damn jar!
Osner? Oh my! He escaped!
Free at last! Hahaha! I’ll smash that damn jar!
I told you to be careful with the jar! We’ll be in big trouble if that breaks!
You are not in the same channel as your party leader. Go to the party leader’s channel!
Thank you for saving me.
You said your name is Molly? Tell your story. Take your time.
The Sea of Spores was a fierce battlefield in the past.
It was turned into a wasteland by powerful magic.
The Sea of Spores is toxic.
No ordinary creatures can live there.
It seems to be reacting to some sort of energy.
They seemed to have gained power because of the mutation.
You’re saying the magic caused the mutation?
No, but it was sped up.
Mutation was already in progress.
To think Molly’s power could have such an effect...
Molly caused an explosion
while she was escaping the dark brotherhood.
That means... the explosion accelerated the mutation!
I’m not sure why exactly the Dark Brotherhood is after Molly,
but I’m certain we shouldn’t let them get their hands on her.
Hey! This way! Look at this!
There’s a big one over there!
A big one is coming. This is dangerous.
We need to gather the barrier device crystal fragments.
We need to stop them from coming close, okay?
Emon said we need those to restore the barrier device.
This way! Help! I’m being attacked!
Damn! Such brute strength!
They’re rampaging!
So they have no reason to destroy the barrier device?
Something’s fishy! Someone must be behind all this.
Spore flowers will bloom from your corpses!
What in the world are you saying? Take this!
Hurry! I’m supposed to meet Theodore up ahead!
Go ahead! I’ll deal with our tail!
Here! I found a survivor!
Emon and Pan, protect Molly and the survivor!
M-me too! Can’t you protect me, too?
Meow! Bring it on! We’re stronger than you guys!

Name: Oel Mahum Fighter
Message: Krrr! That cat is mine!
N-no! I called dibs! That cat is mine!
W-what’s going on? Get away from me!
So they knew about our cat merchant...
That means the shaman must be observing us.
You’re a total merchant, aren’t you?
I’ll take that as a compliment, meow.
Sure, take it however way you will.
Everyone, time to move!
Theodore! The monsters are coming!
Ignore them and run.
Ah, it’s an important task!
I’ll help, too!
Is there no other way? Meow!
Don’t lose focus.
Everyone, give me strength!
Meow! This wasn’t in our plans!
Ugh... My energy isn’t coming back.
Whoa! It’s gigantic!
We have to hold on!
Huh? The Oel Mahum and the Dark Brotherhood are in cahoots?
On the bright side, now we understand the situation. There won’t be any more surprises.
The Oel Mahum have two masters.
Let’s take care of White Captain Labaki first.

Name: Labaki
Message: You arrogant fools! How dare you challenge me!
Labaki, isn’t this for the better?
Oh, yeah! I’ll take a big reward for myself while I’m at it! Hahaha!
Uh oh! It seems you’re looking down at us!
Does this mean anything?
We need to show them that we’re stronger.
Now we deal with High Shaman Ukra!
We need to travel south a ways.
Do your best to ignore anyone who attacks from behind.
There will be no end to this if we deal with them individually.
Hey merchant, why are you working so hard?
Hardin made a special request of me.
There is no adventurer who has traveled Oren more than I have.
Hahaha. I see. Here I was thinking you found your sense of justice!
I’m not dumb! I don’t do anything if the pay’s not good.

Name: Ukra
Message: Oh? You guys saved us the trouble of finding you!
Here we go! Who wants to die?
You sure are reckless! I’ll kill you myself!
I’m afraid we’re only going to make him angrier...
Just trust me! This is why you have such a hard time!
I wonder if “flaunting” will have any effect...?
There’s no one chasing us, right? Then we don’t have a problem!

Name: Iron Tooth
Message: You may have come here on your own accord, but you won’t be free to leave as you wish!
Pan! You said there were only two!
Meow meow! That’s not important right now!
It’s him! He planted the flag!
Labaki and Ukra were two of my favorites!
I’ll skewer you all!
Oh, my... I didn’t see things going this badly!
Meow! What do we do? I’m scared!
Die! You damn cat!
Eek!
Pan’s hurt! Let’s finish this - fast!
Wipe them out!

Name: Gelan
Message: Yeah! Pummel them to smithereens!
Yes, sir!
Where are you going, sir?
Gasp! W-who’s there?
I’m disappointed that you don’t know me!
Remember this for the future, Dark Brotherhood!
I’m Aymel of the Silverlight Mercenaries! Got it?
Hmph! I did hear about a dumb girl!
You’re no match for Elizabeth!
Elizabeth... How dare you speak that name in my presence!
You’ve made a mistake! Die!
Argh! Damn it! What’s wrong with this girl?
Theodore! Who exactly is Molly?
I’m as curious as you are, but I know one thing for certain:
The Dark Brotherhood is after her.
What incredible magic... It’s a relief the magic circle held out.
Could I find out how exactly she is of use?
Be quiet! Do Ivory Tower Wizards not need filters?
Oh, sir. I sincerely need some filters!
Hahaha... Think of this as the price of a filter, Emon.
I’ll go get Molly. We’ll catch up further in.
You know about that? I guess you aren’t simply a noisy cat.
You think the cat caravan hires just anyone?
You didn’t know about this, did you?
I’m a merchant, not a prophet! Don’t be a smart aleck!

Name: Parasite Zombie
Message: Krrrr! Looks tasty!
Uh... You’re not talking about me, right?
I-I wouldn’t taste good!! I promise!
Meow! Put your backs into it! Do something!
They caught up to us! Meow!
Whoa! You were doing something fun here!
Whoa! Reinforcements!
Do one thing for Pan and he won’t stop asking for favors!

Name: Parasite Zombie Lord
Message: Argh! Krrrr!
This isn’t my fault! Do something, meow!
Leave it to me!
Careful, Aymel!
Don’t you worry!
Over here, you walking compost piles!
Arghhhhh!
Come here once you deal with those winged beasts!
This must be the device Emon mentioned.
Kill them all!
Hmph! More trouble for me!
Meow! I’m pushing myself too hard today!
Why exactly are you destroying the barrier device?!
It’s your fault the Sea of Spores is like this!
Hmph. I have no obligation to answer your questions.
Either hand Molly over or die!
I’ll be right back. Please take care of Molly.
Leave it to me!
Don’t worry about me, Theodore.
I’ll use a Teleportation Stone to go there and back.
Hahaha. This is great! I was thinking about running.
Let’s go! We need to cross the bridge!
Hehehe! Embrion sure is impressive!
I didn’t think it would be this easy to break your ranks!
Don’t be foolish! They went to repair the barrier device.
Foolish girl! You think the barrier device would break down on its own?
I was told you’d scatter when the barrier device breaks!
Oh? So you thought this would be easy because I’m alone?
They trusted you, the weakest, to protect Molly! Hahaha!
Laugh while you can!
Bwahahaha!
They’re not chasing us anymore.
You dare kill our brethren?
You must be insane!

Name: Starving Pan Luem
Message: Perfect! My stomach was just starting to rumble.
I’m gonna swallow you whole!
The wardstone is over there. I’ll be on my way.
Cat Merchants are so professional!
Not all of us! I’m a credit to my profession.
Isn’t effort all that matters?
Of course! And I’m good at what I do!
Please defeat the vampire bats first.
Monsters have been appearing non-stop since the storm.
The situation here is more severe than at the graveyard.
Hurry back! I don’t have a good feeling about this!
Now you’re done for!
Kill them all!
Argh! What the heck? These guys are a ton stronger than anyone we’ve faced before!
Well, looks like the kid gloves are off!
The kid gloves were ever on...?
You don’t pose any kind of threat to Embrion!
Hehehe... you’ve been a mere plaything!
I highly doubt a fool such as yourself would understand. Hahaha.
Ahha! I see...
Wh-why are you doing this? Theodore!
Face them with everything!
Aymel and Molly are in danger!
We’ll follow you as soon as we retrieve Aymel and Molly!
The mushrooms are coming!
What did you do to the mushrooms?
I’m worried about my grandpa. He’s alone.
For now, let’s go to your old home.
We aren’t sure what caused the accident at Ivory Tower.
Let’s think about that after we’ve defeated the Dark Brotherhood.
The Ivory Tower Wizards have sent a request for help.
Go rescue the Ivory Tower Wizards and bring them here!

Name: Ivory Tower Wizard Rakan
Message: Thank you! We thought we were done for!

Name: Dark Brotherhood High Priest
Message: Who’s there?
Run away, quick!
One of our friends is collapsed over there!

Name: Ivory Tower Wizard Jaya
Message: Argh! No! I’m bait! Run, everyone!

Name: Nabraham
Message: This is why hunting is so great! Foolish humans! Hahaha
Go! It’s time for some bloodshed!
Defeat as many Fallen Knights as possible!
What’s that over there?
Could that Soulstone have brought the Fallen Knights?

Name: Fallen Knight
Message: Stop them from coming close to the Soulstone!
We need to destroy that Soulstone!
Uh oh! I feel our lord’s anger!
Boost the Doll of Emptiness’s drive to maximum!
Defeat the enemy quickly so we can restore the Soulstone!

Name: Doll of Emptiness
Message: Argh!
Oh my goodness! What do we do?!

Name: Bella
Message: This recipe is for producing magic reagents... and sometimes we use it for cooking.
Don’t get the wrong idea. It’s perfectly safe.
However, this recipe’s magical properties do tend to attract magical life forms...
It will be to your advantage to leave as soon as you find the recipe!
As expected! The magic from the recipe is attracting Gargoyles!
Take it somewhere safe!
Nothing like this ever happened at the Ivory Tower!
They don’t seem to be in their right mind!
Defeat the Timak Orc Elite Soldiers first!
Don’t show any mercy!
You’ve done enough! Come join me and we’ll get out of here!
Defeat anyone who gets close!

Name: Timak Orc Sentinel
Message: Grab them!
How ridiculous! You thought this would be enough to stop us?
Perhaps we should have killed more of those darn Orcs.

Name: Sadistic Crugar
Message: Darian! I see you’re still alive! Hehehe!
I refuse to die before I kill you!
Krrr! I’ll beat you halfway to death and have you begging for your life!
I see you still have your sick fantasies! This is the end for you!
Ha! You’re powerless, but you sure act tough in front of your friends!
That’s it! Shut up and die!
It makes me uneasy to know Orcs are producing bombs...
I’m worried they might make some that work...
And I’m also worried about the duds.
I can’t help that I’m curious!
Here! There’s a bomb here!
Hurry! Move it! Let’s get out of here!
The Orcs have found us!
Grr! How dare you steal the bomb!
We didn’t steal it! We’re just borrowing it for ourselves!
Are you kidding me? You damn rat! Grr!
Rat? I’ll have you know I’m a CAT!
That’s a serious insult, meow!
Be careful with the bombs! We’re done for if it blows!

Name: Aton
Message: You think you can run off with our bombs? Not a chance!
They’re so stubborn! So much trouble for just a few bombs!
Well, you’re causing a lot of trouble for your worthless life!
I’m not worthless! Hiss!!!!
Shut up! Grr!
There’s nothing sadder than seeing a hard-won product depreciate!
Go and collect some of that Dark Witch’s hair.
Once you’re done, hurry back to me.
You can use the Incense of Darkness to preserve the hair’s magic.
I was in the middle of speaking to a customer. Don’t mind him.
Use the Incense of Darkness to preserve the hair’s magic.

Name: Dark Witch
Message: Who?! Who dares harm one of our sisters?

Name: Mancini
Message: Oh! Kutcher! Your business partner must be quite skilled.
Have a look! They’re strong enough to hunt Dark Witches!

Name: Kilbanus
Message: Finally. You may have tried to hide your coven in the Ivory Tower, but your time is up!

Name: Eye of Darkness
Message: Found it! I’ll deal with it quickly!
Just as expected! We’ve prepared for just this.
Do your best!
Hey! Thief! Give me back my stuff!
Hang it over there on the drying rack.

Name: Timak Orc Berserker
Message: Oh! Leech meat! This is great!
Meow? This is dangerous! They’re aiming for the leech!
Don’t take this personally, but I can’t let you live!
Did you hear? They’re really wicked!
I have a bad feeling about these tremors...
Whoa! What is that? Help me! Run!
We have our hands full with the Orc thieves! This is a big problem!
No! This is our chance! Let’s catch that big one and guarantee some profit for ourselves!
This crisis is our chance! Hang in there!
Those damn bandits...
They’ve resisted the oppression of the Ivory Tower Wizards.
We can’t look down on them.
This way!
It’s dangerous to stay. Let’s get out of here!

Name: Bandit Shaman
Message: It’s them! I knew they were bad guys!
Hmm. My goodness! Run away!
Hmm? I think they dropped something. Will you look around?

Name: Saraxia
Message: Hahaha! Stupid Oel Mahum!
How long did you think you could contain me for?
W-what is that? Something jumped out!
Huh? You’re not an Oel Mahum! Well, no matter! You must be an enemy as well!
Be careful! He looks dangerous!
Be careful. They’re no pushovers.
Bring me their equipment.
Don’t let your guard down. This is their territory.
That equipment! It seems... special.

Name: Paska
Message: Hey, you! That equipment’s reserved for Oel Mahum use ONLY!
Get your filthy hands off it!

Name: Kirinaldo
Message: I’m getting ready to go outside and see Dorothy...
I passed out when I was teleported out of the tower.
I could’ve been eaten by a Grendel!
Thank you for saving me.
Hey! Are you close by? I think I’m in just a touch of danger!

Name: Durticlo
Message: Roar!
Dorothy! Dorothy is in danger!
Popularity isn’t always a good thing! Aren’t you going to help me?
I passed out when I was teleported out of the tower.
Thankfully, this is a curse I can deal with.
But even I can’t be sure if we delay any longer!

Name: Bandit Rookie
Message: Who’s there?
Huh? A thief? Wow! I am absolutely lost for words!
You sure are bold, stealing from bandits!
Over there! Let’s get those guys too!
This way! Hurry! Theodore is waiting!

Name: Bandit Looter
Message: Captain! It’s them!

Name: Bandit Looter Captain
Message: Gasp! In all the time I’ve been a bandit - this is a first!
Bandits steal! They aren’t stolen from!
Just you watch, you thieves! I’ll steal from you!
We don’t have time for this...
Do you want to die?!
What brings you here? What reason?
You’re chasing after the Dark Brotherhood?
I’m not sure what this has to do with us being attacked...
But we can think about that after we save our friends.
Steal the armor from the Bandit Plunderer?
This is fun, isn’t it?
Let’s go before more come!

Name: Hamsen
Message: Help! I’m trapped.

Name: Bandit Plunderer
Message: What are you doing to my prisoner? Get your hands off!
Hey! I’m not an object! How rude!
Hey... Edina, what’s that smell?
That’s rude to ask! And it hardly matters right now!

Name: Lonardo
Message: Here, over here!
Nice. Let’s grab and sell these guys too!
We won’t be caught a second time, you fools!

Name: Lowren
Message: Stop! Who’s there?
Let’s take care of this before he calls his minions!
Oh no! We’re too late!
Oh! It’s you from the Ivory Tower! You’ve made a mistake.
Perfect! I’ve always wanted to wreck you!

Name: Bandit Chore Person
Message: Huh? There’s a fire! Fire!!!
You want to know why the treasure has caught fire?
I can’t tell you... but it’s Ivory Tower Arcane Magic.
Fire! Fire!!!
Put the fire out now!
Huh? Who are you guys?

Name: Bandit Fighter
Message: Argh! A fire? We’re all done for if the boss finds out about this!
They seem to have lit the fire!
Boss! It’s a real fire!

Name: Igorasi
Message: Everyone! Put out the fire! Now!
Who are you? Are you the one causing a ruckus in our base?
What’s your deal?! You’re not even an Ivory Tower Wizard!
Anyone who helps the Ivory Tower Wizard will die!
Intruder! The boss has fallen!

Name: Lakasi
Message: What?! Hold them tight until I get there!
Sheesh, you guys catch on quick!
Huff huff. A little bit slower... Argh!
I’ll be there to help soon.
So the Bandit Stronghold wasn't just attacked...
They were completely conquered...
Hardin said our first priority is to help the Ivory Tower Wizard.
I don’t think Hardin’s judgment is wrong...
But he doesn’t seem to be paying much attention to finding Molly...
Doesn’t this guy seem pretty useful?
Atrox’s shell will make the good-luck charm stronger.
The Dark Witches and the Ivory Tower are known to have a bad relationship.
Well, I don’t think anyone in the area would like Ivory Tower Wizards.
They’ve always used their magic to rule this place with an iron fist.

Name: Dark Witch Prison Guard
Message: You’re in cahoots with the Ivory Tower Wizards!
Sisters! I smell a rat!

Name: Bayona
Message: The Timak Orcs and Dark Witches are also known to have a bad relationship.
But they’ve formed an alliance against the Ivory Tower.

Name: Sechalla
Message: As promised, these two are now yours.

Name: Bulvarak
Message: We are quite pleased with our alliance! Krrr!
They’ll be a great sacrifice! Krrr!
Krr. What’s their deal? Unwelcome guests?
Catch them alive! Otherwise they’re worthless!
Why don’t you go back and wait? Krrr. There is no change to the trade conditions.
Sure thing, Bulvarak.
Hmm.. well, one thing’s going right! The Orcs are retreating!
What a big mouth you have. Can you defeat our sisters?
Fools! To think you all would come here on your own accord.
I expected a Wizard would be smarter.
I guess they’re not too bad!
What are you supposed to be? The Ivory Tower’s dogs?
They’re pretty strong - keep your guard up!
I thought the Dark Witches and Timak Orcs hated each other.
Since when do they get along?
I overheard something while I was captured...
It seems the Timak Orcs, Dark Witches, and the Bandits have formed an alliance.
Against who?

Name: Timak Orc Prison Guard
Message: We have an escapee! Krrr! Get them!
You’re in league with those Ivory Tower fools!
We’ve come to see your cowardly leader!
We hear your leader is a coward who goes knock-kneed in front of that Dark Elf woman!

Name: Grimstone
Message: I thought Wizards were supposed to be smart. Perhaps you’re an exception!
It’s you, you cowardly Orc!
I am not a coward! You insulted me! You’re done for!
Thank you, Theodore! Best of luck to you!
Grab him! Intruder!
I’ll deal with them all at once.
Hyaaaaah!
Hurry, let’s search the inside! Valter’s already left.
Finish checking here and then follow Theodore.

Name: Timak Orc Elite Ranger
Message: This way! We found them! Krrr!
How dare you attack us! Krr!!!
They’re incredibly upset!
Don’t be startled. We’re stronger than them.
That’s funny! Krr! You puny twig!

Name: Avakar
Message: Move! Out of the way, fools! What are you doing?

Name: Timak Orc Officer
Message: Krrr! Avakar! We were just about to deal with the situation...
Quiet, you useless fool! Didn’t I tell you to strike enemies with full force?
Don’t underestimate your enemies! Everyone, attack!
There’s something different about these guys!
Haha! Do you think so?
Don’t let them live! Kill them all!
They have no idea how strong their enemies are!
That’s reassuring, isn’t it? Hmm... I wonder why I’m such a burden. Argh!

Name: Timak Orc Technician
Message: YOU! You broke my bomb!
Is there a battle there? Help me after you deal with it!
Theodore? We need to clean up this situation quickly.

Name: Timak Orc Top-grade Warrior
Message: This is perfect! I needed some meat to give to the wolves!

Name: Timak Orc Wolf
Message: Krrr!
Argh! They’re quite aggressive!
The wolves are coming!
The wolves are faster than us.
We won’t be able to pass until we deal with all the wolves.
Those stubborn Silverlight Mercenaries! I’m so sick of them!
Elizabeth, how could you be so cruel?
That’s a stupid question.
Elizabeth!
I feel reassured with you here, Hardin!
I... see...

Name: Timak Orc Ranger
Message: To think they’d follow us here! Krr!
Give up, Orcs! Your leader has already surrendered.
Well, then I’m the new leader! Die!!! Krrr!
Talking’s getting us nowhere.
We have to get to the Ivory Tower. Defeat these Orcs and clear the path!
I don’t remember it feeling so ominous before...
I have no intention of going against Hardin, but...
We can’t waste any more time...
Don’t you worry! This isn’t the first time!

Name: Timak Orc Patrol
Message: Over there! The Ivory Tower Wizards!
That girl wizard is mine!
Huh? You stinky barbarian!
How dare you sneak a peek! This should put you off your bad habit.
Ambush! Everyone, prepare to fight!
How did they find us?
How dare you do that do the dean?
Calm down, Edina!
Seems the dean of the Ivory Tower doesn’t have much power...
Eeek! Who are you? What did you do to the dean?
It is as you saw. You will face the same fate, Wizard.
My subordinates will carry out their duties to their fullest.
I wonder who’ll survive this fight.
Roar!
Hey! What are you after? Are you after a Nebulite?
Hehehe. I’m not sure why Elizabeth is letting you live.
What?
I’ll kill you for everyone’s benefit, Theodore.
Enjoy the rest of your life... short as it may be. Hehehe...
Emerson seems to have regained his strength.
Let’s look for the others.

Name: Emerson
Message: If you want to enter the Ivory Tower,
you need two more High Wizards in addition to me.
The majority of magic-powered devices have broken.
Huh? Is this a trap?
That’s correct! I knew this would work! Hehehe.
I’ll get to kill you now!

Name: Sosa
Message: You know the dean is dead, right?
That’s why the Silverlight Mercenaries are trying to enter the Ivory Tower.
Ah. I met Emerson. He’s quite alright.
That’s a relief. I wonder if we’ll have a chance with the Silverlight Mercenaries.
The enemies are strong. I’m concerned whether this will only lead to more casualties...

Name: Vanuel
Message: Getting caught is only a matter of time!
Find them! After them!

Name: Void Hound
Message: Sniff sniff! Krrr!
You don’t necessarily have to face them. Run away! We should join forces with our friends!
That’s not the right attitude, Theodore! Where do you think you’re going?
That Dark Elf wizard is Theodore! After him!
Wow! You’re so popular, Theodore!
They’re trying to buy some time. Defeat them quickly!

Name: Sansiro
Message: My mission is to keep you here.
Since that’s the case, how about you hold still? Or maybe just die?
Die, Silverlight Mercenaries!
Theodore, you moron.
You don’t even know what Hardin wants, right?
W-what are you talking about?
Ha. So you’re interested? Well, you’ll need to find me then.
Well, if you want to know who wants Beleth’s return the most...
Who’s that...?
What are you trying to say, Elizabeth...?
I’m using detection magic to look for Elizabeth.
Do your best to ignore any monsters that approach us.
Stop, Elizabeth!

Name: Kazniak
Message: Arrogant and rude! Say my name with respect!
Stop acting childish, Elizabeth!
I’ll have to teach you a lesson about manners, Dark Elf!
As expected... security around the Nebulite is tight.
Is that why the plan is to stop the flow of magic into the Summoning Circle?
Thank you, Theodore.

Name: Obsidian Gargoyle
Message: Intruder alert! Eliminate them immediately!
Hmmph! Don’t you fools recognize your master?
Danger! Deal with it immediately!
You should’ve done this sooner, you idiots! Not to me, but to the Dark Brotherhood!
You’re quick on the uptake. You want to cut off power to the magic circle?
Oh? You’re not as dumb as you seem, are you?
You cannot take the Nebulite! It’s too dangerous!
Well, I’m sure that’s true - for idiots!
I’m sure Hardin would like that to happen.
I mean, he would like us to take the Nebulite.
That’s ridiculous!
You want to bet on that, Theodore?
The one who wants Beleth’s return the most...
Is Hardin!
Nonsense! You’re insane, Elizabeth!
Hahaha! Exactly the reaction I expected!
Well, that’s too bad. You’ll never be able to stop us now!
Intruder located! All Guardians, battle stations!

Name: Ivory Tower Guardian
Message: Kill the intruders!
We can’t hold out much longer! There’s too many of them! How long until we can escape?
Shriek!
Damn! The spell has broken!
Argh! Don’t give up! We still have time!
No! There are more coming!
Focus!
Hard to focus when we’re being attacked!
Huff! Huff! I can’t hold on much... longer...
Damn! Is this how I die...? Argh!
We’re almost there! Look! The hunters’ campsite!
Huff... Huff...
R-run! Hurry!

Name: Hunter
Message: W-what’s going on?
Has something happened?
S-stop them!
Argh!
W-what is this?
N-no... S-save us!
That over there is the impregnable fortress, the Town of Oren!
Stop!
The traitors of Oren have shown up on their own accord!
What? Traitors? What are you talking about?
You heard me correctly, Steiner.
We all know you betrayed Oren and murdered the first lady!
C-Christine?
I see there are Giran informants with you!
What? Informants?
No, Russel! Hold on!
Guards! Arrest them immediately!
Christine!
Prepare yourself!
This is the end for you!
Argh!

Name: Salein
Message: S-Steiner!
There’s no need to hide this anymore!
The prisoners are getting away!
Oh no, it’s too late! Ugh! What a mess!

Name: Barka Silenos
Message: How are you guys?
Don’t you dare act arrogant! Get them!
Back off.
A-argh... Is everyone alright?
W-what’s going on? What happened?
These guys sure aren’t pushovers. Careful!

Name: Squire
Message: Argh... Damn them!
Now! Take this!
Get out of the way!
I’ll hand it back to you!
We’ve been delayed.
No... Don’t do this...

Name: Oel Mahum Shaman
Message: You’re all rats in a hole.
Is that a sentry? They’ve spotted us!
Show yourselves, minions of darkness!
It’s them!
Just as expected of Theodore!
Argh! Get rid of them!
Hurry and activate the barrier device!

Name: Oel Mahum
Message: Destroy them all!!!
They’re coming!!!
Ugh... Not enough... Mana...
I’ll help, too!
We’re almost here! Hang in there!
Did you think you could get away so easily?
Pan! I’ll trust you with him!
H-how can you do this to me?
R-run!!!
Uh... Wait!
Don’t follow me!
Whoa! That’s incredible!
Tsk... this situation isn’t good...
Hey, look here. I’ll spare your life if you head back.
I think you’re going to be the one to die, don’t you?
You useless simpletons! Do I really have to take matters into my own hands?
Argh! Elizabeth!!!
Nothing will change, even if you bother us.
Bring back that girl.

Name: Ivory Tower Wizard 1
Message: Shut up and listen.
We’re done for the moment we step through that door.
When I give you the signal, follow the plan.
Three, two, one... Now!
Now! Hurry!

Name: Ivory Tower Wizard 2
Message: Mana Shield!
I can’t hold on anymore!
Almost done! Just a little more!
We’re at our limit!
Nice! We’re done!
Meteor Shower!
It’s time! Run!
You dumb Orcs! Can’t you do your jobs properly?

Name: Ivory Tower Wizard 3
Message: You’re in cahoots with the ambushers!
I guess Embrion isn’t as great as I thought since you imbeciles were able to escape!
I’ll deal with you myself.
R-run!
We finally caught you!
Rip them to shreds!
Oh no... Is this it for me...
Is everyone okay? I’m glad I’m not too late.
Now! Hit them hard!
Thunder Storm!
Not bad. As expected from a dean.
I was just thinking that magic users must be worthless since we were able to conquer the Ivory Tower so easily.

Name: Ivory Tower Wizard 1
Message: Worthless? How dare you!
Oh my. My apologies. That was quite rude of me.
Embrion, what are you planning?
Oh, not much.
But I couldn’t come empty handed.
The m-mana!
I hope you enjoy my gift...
Who’s there?
Wait! Elizabeth!
There’s no use, Theodore. I’ve already set up a barrier.
Stop!
You’re dangerous because you know the secret of the Giants!
Shut up, Theodore! You don’t even understand the situation you’re in.
Stop!
Beleth is waiting.
That requires no reply.
Theodore, know this... I must defeat him. For her sake.
No!
Theodore! Is it time yet?
The mana is starting to run low.
Just a bit more... Hang on a bit longer!
Theodore! It’s dangerous!
I see it’s not too late. Is everyone alright?

Name: Theodore & Edina
Message: Oh no.
How dare a Wizard try to steal our product!
They’ll come swarming soon!
There’s no time! Hurry, run!
I’ll make sure they can’t follow us!
We’re okay now.
It’s too early to feel relieved. We have to keep moving.
I hear it’s two apples’ worth of Adena...
Ugh... I wanna cry...
Huh? What’s this guy doing on our turf?
Shoo! Shoo! Bug off!
We didn’t steal anything! I mean - we didn’t steal anything THIS TIME!
Where are you? I’m in front of the tent.
Hey! You messed with the kid - now you’ve gotta mess with me!
Did you guys steal my money?
This is a stick-up. Hand over everything you’ve got!
Is that how you’re going to be?
Hey, you there! Stop!
What’s your problem? What dumpster did you crawl out of?

Name: Kayteach
Message: Me no dirty! You insult me! You gonna pay!
You think I’m just going to stand here and take a beating? Now it’s your turn! Hahaha!
Ugh, what a bunch of lowlifes. Keep the money!
Ugh! You reek! Use this to purchase your one-way ticket to hell!
What good’s a Watcher who can’t tell friend from foe?
I can’t believe I had to hide every time I come through here.
Take that and I’m sure the Ivory Tower will loosen up on their accusations.
It’s quite a valuable item to someone who knows how to use it.

Name: Barrier Watchman
Message: Support requested! Serious crime detected.
What’s that? You’re finally ready to do some actual work?
Criminal offense committed. Watcher body damaged.
You will be killed if you resist arrest.
Whoa! Slow down! There’s no need for that!

Name: Gallonian
Message: Argh! What is wrong with you?!
Do you have any idea how hard I worked on this?
Is he not from the Dark Brotherhood? My goodness...
Without those, the Golems will be useless. They can’t even be recycled!
Return that to me this instant, you thief!
I find you calling me a thief quite ridiculous.
You have been invited to join a new clan. Check the Clan Menu for details.
Your journey isn’t over yet! Check the Journey Quest for details.

Name: Zaken Pirates Hammerfist
Message: The escapee! Catch him!
There are others! Catch them as well!
You guys are the Silverlight Mercenaries! Help me out, will you?
Keys. You need keys! Check the desk over there!
Actually, we didn’t tell you about the mission of our Advance Party.

We’re looking for
the missing countess of Giran,
Trisha.
Typical pirates! They blocked the road!
Let’s talk after we clean up this trash pile.
Word is that she was recently seen at the harbor.
So we followed that lead here, but only found her diary.

Those darn pirates must have abducted her.
They must be trying to eliminate anyone who might get in their way!

Darn it!
For better or for worse,
it’s just a Leech Egg!

Be careful of
their mucus!

Ugh...
 Be careful!
 Leonard is no chump!

Name: Leonard
Message:
I can already
smell the sweet
scent of blood!

How about I rip him to shreds
and taste his blood?

Ugh... are you all okay?
Come over here for a moment.

Please...
Bring the Baron and his soldiers
here safely!

Name: Zaken Pirates Lookout
Message:
Huh?
How did they get here?!

Name: Douglas
Message:
Search the ship
thoroughly!

If you don’t want
to be Kraken food,
you better hurry it up!

If they come,
I’ll call you.
When I do, you better be quick!!

5 minutes.
Just hold on for 5 more minutes!
Trisha!!!

Name: Trisha
Message:
I’ll try,
I’ll try my best.
Zaken!

Scoundrels.
You killed Leonard
to get here, didn’t you?

You killed my Guardian Knight.
I guess you’ll
have to take his place!
Did you think you could get away?
I wonder what color your blood is. Let’s see!
Argh... I... need blood!
Go away! Leave!
No!!! I... I can’t die yet!
Die! All of you, die!

We’ve arrived!
Keep your hands off of Trisha! Scum!

Name: Zaken Pirates Boatswain
Message: Intruder! Catch the intruder!

They’re here!
Hurry up!

Name: Ramog’s Guard Grenadier
Message:
Intruders! Must destroy!
Bombs! Must throw!

Name: Ramog’s Guard
Message:
Oh, Great Ramog!
Those who interrupt the ritual must die!

Name: Ramog’s Royal Guard
Message:
Intruder! Intruder alert!
Repeat! Intruders!

Name: Lunatic Self-destructing Soldier
Message:
Persistent fools!
I’ll self-destruct!
We all die!

Name: Laenis
Message:
Hello! Is anybody there?!
I don’t care if you’re an orc,
please just save me!

Be careful!
That orc
is a Guard Captain here!

Name: Boranta
Message:
Why are you
humans here?

Kill all those
who cannot
be sacrificed!

Hey there!
Did you forget about me?
Please get me out of here!

Paagrio’s strength
is enough to
rival the gods!

If these crazy orcs
acquire that power...
Oh no...

It’s a scary
thought.
We must stop them!

This way!
We must hurry!

We can escape
as soon as we get rid of this.

If you follow this road
a cave with an altar
will appear!

Name: Ramog
Message:
Humans!
What is stupid Boranta
doing?

No.
It’s actually better.
The power of Paagrio...

I’ll test this out
on you.
You should feel honored!
Now, it’s your turn!

If you get hit alone,
it is going to hurt!
Bug off!
Boom! Wahahaha!
This is Paagrio’s power!
Wahahaha!
Death will soon be upon you...!
Paagrio! Give me strength!

You fools!
What are my guards doing?!
Help me!

Gahhh!
Archers! Bring out all my archers!
Eliminate these fools!

What... what the!
Gahh! I fight to the death!
Self-destructing soldiers, attack!

If only Ramog can acquire the power of Paagrio...!
You would... ugh!

Don’t think this is over...!
There will be even more orcs in the future...!
When that day comes, you will fall. There will be no hope! Wahahaha!

Name: Defense Device
Message: Intruder alert. Intruder alert.
Self-defense mechanisms activated. Self-defense mechanisms activated.
Intruder targeting configured. Eliminate all intruders.
I knew they’d have crazy technology.
It seems they have been researching and developing these weapons.
A weapon that uses souls to increase strength and battle the gods...
So much research and testing were required to create this ultimate weapon.
How could they treat living humans as lab rats?
Oh no! Hardin is in the midst of battle!
Careful! They are stronger than they look!
The barrier on the guard unit has been removed!
We can attack now!
Can you dodge this?!
It won’t be easy this time around!
Oh Paagrio! Finish the job!

Name: Leewen
Message:
I’ve tried
to infiltrate many times,

but I failed every time
because of the signal fires
somewhere inside the village.

How dare you!
If you go to the guard post
Boranta will be mad!

If Captain Boranta
is Mad!
We all die!

God of light,
Shower me with
the power of purification!
How dare you refuse the once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to be Ramog’s sacrifice!
You deserve to die!
Boom!
Not bad!
Now the ritual preparations are complete.
All you shamans always object!
Always saying not to awaken the power of Paagrio!
Now, I’ll use your blood to awaken Paagrio’s power!
I’ll drag you out!
So, this is Paagrio’s power!
This is the beginning of my world!
W-what’s that?
You’re the Guardian Knight, Leonard?!
What in the world is this?
This is nothing personal.

I’ll need you to let go of your sword.
I don’t want unnecessary attention brought upon this place!
Now, over there!

Name: Alert
Message: Boss! Boss!!!
What is it?
Intruders! Intruders have appeared!
What? You idiot! You took this long to tell me that?!
Boss!
Everyone, get up!
Zaken.
I’m terrified...
When are you coming back...?
We’re doing our best, Trisha... Just a little bit more...
How dare you!
Well... I don’t have much of a choice... I’ll do my best to hold on until Zaken arrives.
Did the Lord of Giran send you?
You may already know, but I have no intention of returning.
There is only one answer!
You will remain here. Forever!

Name: Fairway
Message:
Trisha, no!
Now, Zaken...
Wherever you are!
I will find you, and destroy any evidence you ever existed!

How dare you...!
Don’t you dare attempt to stop me!

Name: Orc Shaman
Message:
Paagrio’s power!
It is not for
a mere Orc to have!

This power
is too strong
for an Orc like you!

Fools.
I will demolish
your soul!

Arghh...
My strength...
You fools...!

You can’t have that power!
Halt! Ramog!

Fools...!
Do you hinder me
even in death?!

The Nebulite Crystal!
It must be destroyed!
Hurry!

I’ll finish
you off now!
I’ll show you my true strength!
Command Rights are required to use Clan Voice Chat!
마법 생물 특성 장비를 성장 시킨 후 다시 도전해보세요!
Pay for your sins with your death!
You’ll join her soon!
The light is gone! There’s no hope for you now!

Name: Zaken Blood Ranger
Message: Oh... Oh, no! The sun is being blocked!
The sun is halfway gone!
We’re doomed! The sun is almost completely gone!
I don’t know what a Giran aristocrat is doing here.
Show some respect.
Hey, you there! You’re smuggling, aren’t you?
W-what? What are you talking about? I am an officer of the army!
We caught him red-handed! Arrest him!
What is this?
Don’t worry, Alexander. I’m sure this is all just a misunderstanding.
I’ll send you to the gallows!
Let’s go!
So you’re Zaken! You... You’ve ruined everything!
You’ve ruined her chance to become Aden’s Archduchess...
You’ve ruined everything!

Name: Phantom of Zaken
Message: I heard enough about you from Trisha.
Do you remember abusing her when she was a child?
She shudders at a mere thought of you.
It’s a happy life compared to the one she would’ve suffered with you!
Don’t pretend you’re doing this for her! Hypocrite!

Name: Abelino
Message: Watch out, Sir Alexander!
Ugh... You! What have you done to me?!
I took over your body. You no longer have freedom.
I will take this hypocrite away.
Follow me to my flagship if you can!
S-save me! My body is... Moving on its own! Help!
Sir Alexander!

Name: Pirate Zombie
Message: Whoa...
It seems battle is inevitable thanks to Zaken’s minions.
That was just Zaken’s phantom. His body must be somewhere else.
I think he’s taken Sir Alexander hostage so that you’ll go to him.
You must be wary of the area surrounding the flagship, that’s where Zaken is waiting.
Zaken is able to create an Outworld, a world much like ours but also very different.
You must take care to avoid nighttime in his realm.
His power reaches its height at nightfall.
Then no one is able to stop him.
He’s... done something strange to me...
Oh no, Sir Alexander!

Name: Mutated Sir Alexander
Message: Grrr... Huh? What’s wrong with me?!
What happened to me? Zaken, you bastard!!!
Calm yourself, please!
It looks like the mutation has made him extremely aggressive! Watch out!
Hate... I hate you all! Look at me... It’s all your fault!
Gahhhhhhhhhhh!!!
Please! Alexander, stop!

Name: Zaken’s Voice
Message: Hahahahaha....!
What was that? Zaken? Where is he?
Kill... then kill again! Kill each other to survive!
Even if you manage to withstand this hell, another one awaits!
We’ve become mere entertainment for Zaken to enjoy...
Ugh... We can’t... go easy on this monster.
We must defeat Sir Alexander no matter what!
